A courageous sea explorer! Risking life and limb to explore the depths for all of mousekind! Fascinated with what lies beneath the deep, him and his team of explorers trawl the ocean floor looking for unexplored sunken history. Finding the odd treasure here and there is also a big plus!

By using antiquated diving equipment, it saves him from having to pass emissions testing imposed on newer diving gear.

name: Deranged Deckhand Mouse
description:
Part of an unsavoury crew of pirate mice that used to sail the seas long, long ago. Something just wouldn't let these mice rest down under in Casey Jones' Closet and now they are looking for others to join them!

This is one crew you do not want to be apart of.

name: Derpshark Mouse
description:
An eccentric type of fish, totally oblivious to everything in the ocean, even foregoing eating and sleeping if something shiny happens to catch their eye. You know when one is nearby based on its whale-like howls and echoing cries (it thinks it's a whale).

Long and loud howls can be heard wherever Derpsharks congregate. There is nothing to fear, however, as they are relatively harmless to others. But it is wise to keep your distance when they gather, because they might not notice you nearby and overwhelm you with their massive crowd!

name: Dread Pirate Mousert
description: A legendary pirate who strikes fear into all of his foes for he takes no prisoners. Some believe he is immortal, others suggest such a thing inconceivable and state that he is merely different mice playing up a pseudonym. Whatever the case, we know he is in the pirating business for all the sweet Barnacles! Or was it to rescue Princess Barnacle? No wait... Well, anyway, if you catch this mouse you probably won't be able to get him to talk... or was that to get him to STOP talking...? Either way, you will have the upper hand because we know he is left-handed! ...Probably!

name: Eel Mouse
description:
Slippery and slimy! Loves to burrow down into the mud and sand in the deeper areas of the ocean. Accustomed to the deep, they have developed a phosphorus glow produced by running a self-generated electric current through their glass-like fins.

This current is also used for self-defence. Other deep sea mice familiar with their eerie green glow tend to keep their distance for fear of getting shocked, again!

name: Elite Guardian Mouse
description: Highly-trained guard that is sworn to protect the citizens of the once lost Sunken City. More importantly, to protect their most precious commodity: Oxygen! These guards keep a wary eye about for those looking to grab a little more than their allocated stipend.

name: Enginseer Mouse
description:
The most brilliant mice below sea level. The Enginseer uses ancient wisdom, technology and magic to develop and harmonize the advanced systems and machinery used within the incredible Sunken City.

They are seen as the very heart and soul that really make the Sunken City come alive!

name: Guppy Mouse
description:
A very social aquatic mouse! So adept at talking that the Guppy Mouse has learned to live without closing its mouth! Makes eating and talking a lot easier, and a lot more gross. This is the mouse to turn to for all the latest gossip and hottest underwater fashion trends!

Do you like seefood?

name: Hydrologist Mouse
description:
The Hydrologists have made the impossible possible! With their advanced understandings and study of water, they have made the idea of an underwater habitat a reality!

In charge of keeping the homeostasis of the Sunken City, they work diligently to keep everything running smoothly.

name: Jellyfish Mouse
description: The ballerina of the sea!  Floating majestically throughout the depths, she mesmerizes onlookers with her soft glow and flowing gelatinous gown.  But beware of her tentacles! They act as toxin-filled drift nets, capturing prey as they idly float by, enamoured by her spectacular performance.

name: Koimaid Mouse
description: Brightly-coloured and always smiling, the gentle Koimaid Mouse has a soft spot for all of the smaller aquatic creatures in the ocean. She dedicates her time to caring for and helping raise all of the little ones like a second mother and does her best to keep them out of trouble.

name: Manatee Mouse
description:
Slow and sleepy: The two defining characteristics of the Manatee Mouse. If he's not asleep, he's drifting towards something to eat. Eventually.

Never in a rush, he goes where the current takes him.

name: Mermousette
description:
A hidden jewel of unimaginable beauty hidden within the depths of the ocean. Many myths and legends surround this fabled angel of the ocean, fueling the drive for many a mouse and hunter to brave the rugged seas just to catch a glimpse of her!

It is believed that anyone lucky enough to catch a mermaid would then know true love!

name: Mershark Mouse
description:
Crafty, cunning and cutthroat, the Mershark Mouse is an incredibly efficient and equally-terrifying hunter of the deep. Sharing the same deep blue hue as the ocean itself gives this mouse unparalleled camouflage and stalking abilities.

You won't know the Mershark Mouse is upon you until it's too late!

name: Mlounder Flounder Mouse
description: These little guys love to get into all kinds of trouble!  Fearless and endlessly curious, they get into everything!  They love the warmer waters closer to the surface and thrive off of sunlight.  Their lesser known ability to camouflage makes them harder to find than one would think.

name: Octomermaid Mouse
description:
The sinister sister of the mermice of the sea. Loves the deeper and darker parts of the ocean as she believes it helps keep her pale green complexion. Her lips contain a powerful paralyzing venom, giving her one unforgettable kiss!

Easily mistaken for a Mermousette Mouse above the surface, she uses this guise to bring more than one mousy sailor to their doom! Those poor unfortunate souls!

name: Old One Mouse
description:
Believed to be an ancient wizard from long ago that lost a duel resulting in a terrible transformation and banishment to the ocean deep. Now with nothing left but time, he focuses his abilities and trains his magics.

There is a saying among seafaring hunters: "When the storms are here, the Old One is near."

name: Oxygen Baron Mouse
description:
The Oxygen Baron Mouse exemplifies the characteristics of any successful crime lord: Greed, lust for power, and insatiable gluttony! This corrupt mayor of the Sunken City is obsessed with stockpiling their most valuable resource. Constantly abusing his power by controlling the city's Oxygen supply, he unscrupulously allocates unlimited quantities for his own personal use, leaving those in need of the resource in dire straits.

He who controls the Oxygen controls the city!

name: Pearl Mouse
description:
One of the wealthiest of the ocean-dwelling mice, she is highly sought after by collectors for her special assortment of rare and beautiful pearls. Her body is adorned with permanent jewelry made from the pearls she collects. Some question whether she found these pearls or produced them from her very skin!

She usually keeps a huge spare pearl or two around to tempt those that try to come for her to take it instead!

name: Pearl Diver Mouse
description:
A precious mouse seeking precious pearls. He snorkels searching for a pearl that is just as unique as he is. There is something about their pearly texture that just makes it feel like everything is right in the ocean!

Pearl Diver, he's been down too long in the midnight sea. His friends wonder what is becoming of him. Shiny pearls, white and yellowish colour in hue, the Pearl Diver is coming for you!

name: Pirate Anchor Mouse
description:
Avast, ye landlubbers!

This dutiful pirate bears the most dangerous job of all, the treasure lookout! Whenever the pirate crew of a ship deem there to be treasure about, this pirate goes down with the anchor and takes a quick look!

name: Puffer Mouse
description: Consisting of extremely elastic skin, the Puffer Mouse can easily fill its body up with surrounding water and puff up to a much larger size. This defence mechanism is great for thwarting potential predators but it also is an attractant to hunters who, for a long time, were fooled into thinking they were much heavier mice than they actually are!

name: Saltwater Axolotl Mouse
description: Friendly, curious and boy are they ever energetic!  The Axolotl forever remains in his child-like state.  It loves to play and meet new friends.  With quick, explosive movement they are quite difficult to keep up with.

name: Sand Dollar Diver Mouse
description: Mice looking for newly found wealth and riches dive in search of the mysterious Sand Dollar. Used as currency within the Sunken City, they collect and hoard them in hopes of one day being able to live the good life!

name: Sand Dollar Queen Mouse
description: This mouse is quite the catch if you can find her. Word is, she used to serve fish at the local sand bar until she sashayed her way into a large cache of Sand Dollars during a fashion contest. With her winnings she has taken up a new life of sharing her impressive style sense, teaching others that you’ve got to work for your dreams and the important truth that if you can’t love yourself how are you going to love anybody else?

name: School of Mish
description: Flocking together like underwater birds of a feather, Mish mice go everywhere together!  Never seen in anything less than pairs, these mice rely heavily on strength in numbers!  Never too far from one another, they can easily swarm in the hundreds to help another in need!

name: Seadragon Mouse
description:
The Seadragon Mouse is named after its dragon-like appearance, though it lacks the imposing physique of a true dragon. Fairly small in size, the Seadragon Mouse enjoys life along the bottom of most sea banks, mostly floating and drifting, using their tails to anchor themselves in the more interesting parts of the ocean.

They have long, leaf-like appendages which help them blend in with the local flora. This also makes them exceptionally well suited at peek-a-boo and hide-and-seek!

name: Serpent Monster Mouse
description: Hidden among the outcroppings, burrows and other dark nooks and crannies within the deep, the Serpent Monster Mouse slithers up on their unsuspecting prey out in the dark, swallowing it whole! Their long, sharp teeth act mostly like confining prison bars that prevent the swallowed prey from escaping their life sentence. Yuck!

name: Spear Fisher Mouse
description:
Believed to be the remaining members of an ancient and advanced underwater civilization of mice. They were once technologically advanced and living peacefully in their own aquatic civilization until something reduced that civilization to complete ruin.

Having now lost their city and advanced technologies, they are reduced to spearfishing, instead of industrialized farming, to gather food.

name: Stingray Mouse
description:
The kite of the sea! Swims through the ocean with such little resistance that it looks as though it glides and floats underwater. They are also very curious, tailing interesting things (mice and hunters alike) around for hours on end!

When threatened, they dive bomb into the seabed and hide among the agitated sand. They have an impressive and deadly barbed stinger, luckily used only in self-defence.

name: Sunken Banshee Mouse
description:
Legend states this to be a fairy who has taken on the form of a mousy apparition. The Sunken Banshee Mouse floats through the ocean, looking to warn those at sea of impending danger.

Despite her haunting figure, her soft-glowing eyes calm even the fiercest beasts and bring courage to the frightened. Seen as a good omen by sailors and pirates alike.

name: Sunken Citizen Mouse
description: One of the many citizens of the Sunken City.  Helps out with the everyday construction and maintenance by supplying the workers with much needed materials and lending a hand when needed.

name: Swashblade Mouse
description:
Not to be confused with a swashbuckler, the Swashblade Mouse fights for her own personal gain. Usually along side a pirate crew, she is the first line of offence and makes sure her frontline crew are the first to get paid!

These spirits are usually unable to rest until they have received payment for a job well done.

name: Tadpole Mouse
description:
A tadpole is usually the infant state of amphibian lifeforms. The Tadpole Mouse is a unique exception where it matures into a bigger tadpole with arms and legs, never shedding its tail!

Now fully formed, it's free to explore the underwater world without too much worry from its previous predators.

name: Treasure Hoarder Mouse
description:
The Treasure Hoarder Mouse seeks out the shiniest of shiny, the most precious of preciouses to adorn on its body. These mice cover themselves in shiny, valuable objects in order to attract potential partners. When a male meets a female, they compare looks and potential overall wealth to determine if they are fit for one another.

You better hope they don't beat you to some treasure! It's extremely difficult to remove treasure from them once they've gathered it up and affixed it to their naturally sticky scales.

name: Treasure Keeper Mouse
description:
The strongest and most disciplined Treasure Hoarder mice are hired on as Treasure Keeper mice for the Coral Queen. The keeper collects and keeps safe all of the treasures that are found in the ocean for his majesty.

Being paid handsomely, it is also the easiest way to come across vast amounts of treasure, making his life a lot easier if he is strong enough to fend off the other hoarders!

name: Tritus Mouse
description:
The apex predator of the deep. The whispered king of the Rodentia Ocean. Tall tales and forgotten fables lend to the mysteries about this mouse. Only the oldest, most-hardened and extremely eccentric hunters from the Harbour dare whisper the name of the mighty Tritus.

Take heed: Those that dare to seek this mythical beast must be prepared!

name: Turret Guard Mouse
description:
Hired guns for the Coral Castle to halt invaders and fend off bigger, more hostile aquatic mice. The terrestrial mice outside of the ocean have developed advanced weaponry which is exceptional at hunting underwater. Mice who stumble across this job opening usually leap at the chance. The guard duty is light and the pay is quite heavy!

Although they bring a lot of their own gear with them from the surface, developing new technologies underwater has its difficulties and these mice have to innovate from time to time!

name: Urchin King Mouse
description:
Many tales travel the tides of the Rodentia Ocean and this mouse is the centre of one of them. It is believed that the Old One had struck a bargain with one of the Coral Kings of old, offering untold riches and glory for a price. No one knows what the price was or if it was indeed paid but it appears that the Coral King's disappearance is linked with the appearance of Urchin Kings.

These mice prefer to be alone and are easily angered. Approach with caution as they are highly poisonous to the touch!

name: Captain Croissant Mouse
description:
She loves bread. That's really all you need to know. Not much else is really known about her, in fact! Is she MADE of bread? Is she inside of a gigantic robotic-like suit comprised of baked goods?

We do know she is a mouse of some kind and, being a mouse, she also loves cheese. So, naturally, Grilled Cheese would drive this mouse WILD. Cheese AND bread? TOGETHER?!

Collect Packets of Flour in the Windmill to create Grilled Cheese and free the Windmill from her breaded tyranny!

name: Amplified Brown Mouse
description:
The most basic forms of mice seem to show the most promise for the more advanced, sometimes severe, alterations to their genetics and DNA. The brown mouse has been infused with high levels of protein enriched serum, magnifying his size and muscles.

An unfortunate side effect is regular disruption of brain function, which is why he has been outfitted with control strips along his body to deliver controlled shocks when he becomes unruly.

name: Amplified Grey Mouse
description: The most basic forms of mice seem to show the most promise for the more advanced, sometimes severe, alterations to their genetics and DNA.  The grey mice have an excellent genome suitable to support additional appendages.  The extra parts make him a much more efficient worker suitable for any task, and also much harder to catch!

name: Amplified White Mouse
description: The most basic forms of mice seem to show the most promise for the more advanced, sometimes severe, alterations to their genetics and DNA.  The white mice have the most malleable minds, allowing their mental capacity to be multiplied exponentially!  Exceeding its natural cranial capacity, an extended dome has been installed to accommodate the new brain size.

name: Assassin Beast Mouse
description: Extremely dangerous!  The Assassin Beast Mouse oozes noxious poison from its skin and its fine threadlike hair causes immediate paralysis.  If that wasn't enough, its bite packs an even bigger punch!  Its hollow, syringe-like teeth deliver a powerful gelatinotoxin, turning its victim's insides into delicious lime green gelatin.

name: Automated Sentry Mouse
description:
Stealth black with a tactical design in mind, the Automated Sentry Mouse is quite a technical marvel. Powered thrusters, holographic targeting, satellite ear tracking and an excessively curious artificial intelligence are all standard equipment on this mouse.

Once they acquire a target, it's seek and destroy!

name: Big Bad Behemoth Burroughs Mouse
description:
The big guns when it comes to mass excavation and demolitions! Pollutinum armour plating with spiked sensor rods protruding from its body allow quicker displacement of earth and sensing of vibrations from its surroundings.

Escape is not an option, as one would run out of earth before out-running a Big Bad Behemoth Burroughs!

It was quite a big project to cybernetically enhance a Big Bad Burroughs Mouse, but it really seems to have paid off!

name: Rift Bio Engineer
description:
A Biologically engineered Biological Engineer. Created in a lab to create in a lab. The result of a science experiment to make a cost effective alternative to hiring more scientists. This mouse is very smart and efficient but -- for some reason -- doesn't seem to enjoy his job.

Despite his distaste, he takes his work very seriously and dresses to impress. He dresses for the job he wants, not the job he has. Wonder what it is...?

name: Boulder Biter Mouse
description:
A self sustaining, extremely strong rock miner with rock shattering jaws. Using pneumatic claws to carve through rocks, he consumes the raw materials to power himself. The self production of lambent crystals along his back help illuminate dark caves and areas.

He may not be too hard to catch but he is hard to hold. Special arrangements need to be made for containment or transportation.

name: Clump Mouse
description: This "mouse" is actually a mound of minerals held together by magnetic frequencies generated by a rare rift crystal.  The crystal holds ancient memories from long ago and is searching for its missing pieces to become whole again.  It takes on the form of the most common living entities to avoid suspicion as it works to complete its mission.

name: Count Vampire Mouse
description:
One of the few mice that crave something other than cheese. A grand vampire modified with strange parts and machinery. His exceptional regenerative abilities probably made him an excellent candidate for live experimentation.

The real question is who could have captured a grand vampire let alone have the resources to keep one restrained...

name: Cyber Miner Mouse
description: Remote controlled and outfitted with diamond tipped arm drills, the Cyber Miners start off the drilling projects by marking guide holes and taking lead ahead of the others excavation mice.

name: Cybernetic Specialist Mouse
description: This mouse is one of the main authorities on cybernetics and cybernetic research.  With a vast intelligence and mastery over the sciences, the Cybernetic Specialist designs and helps perform most body modifications and augmentations on the strange mice seen around the rift -- including herself!

name: Doktor Mouse
description:
Ze Doktor is always prepped for surgery! Never without his lab coat or surgical gloves, ze Doktor keeps patients coming and going through surgery like clockwork.

Ze Doktor is in!

name: Evil Scientist Mouse
description: The evil mastermind behind all of the genetic manipulation and cybernetic alteration being performed on the rift mice, all she cares about is science and experimentation.  Leaving the glamorous dreams of conquest to others, she is content to create terrible and fantastic new breeds of mice, record the results in her notebook, and then clean up and start again.

name: Itty Bitty Rifty Burroughs Mouse
description:
A living, cordless power drill! Groups of Itty Bitties drill precision holes and small tunnels to exacting specifications, mainly for wiring, plumbing and ventilation holes.

Care must be taken when overseeing projects with them, as sometimes when they interface with each other, their playful nature overcomes their cybernetic mind and they end up making a big, giant mess that can delay projects for weeks!

name: Lambent Mouse
description: A robotic clone of a Lambent Crystal Mouse -- only instead of resting in its warm and cosy crystal home, it incorporates the crystal directly into its body!  These mice lack their notable romantic purple glow and instead emit shrieks so startling, they rouse fear within the most steadfast of hunters!

name: Lycanoid
description: Captured while transformed, the Lycanoid is one of the most heavily modified of them all.  Extreme modifications were necessary to keep the Lycan from reverting back to its regular state.  Unfortunately they were unable to keep its ferocity in check leaving a highly unstable, uncontrollable beast in its place.

name: Master Exploder Mouse
description:
After being in many of an explosion, the Master Exploder has learned a thing or two about explosions and what makes them big! Able to analyze any material for explosive properties with up to date databanks on explosives, he can make a big bang out of anything!

He'll blow your mind!

name: Mecha Tail Mouse
description: Unable to reliably replicate the toxic plant mutation amalgamation of the monster tail mouse, alternate arrangements were made.  Pollutinum reinforced jaws welded onto an all machine chassis was the answer!  One mean mouse looking machine!

name: Menace of the Rift Mouse
description:
Highly unstable and pumped full of a powerful protein substance, this mouse's metabolism is on overdrive! His body can barely keep itself together under the immense stress of the power inside.

This mouse holds the incredibly powerful Null Gauntlet, and had one of his hands replaced with a cybernetic version in order to allow it to fit.

name: Monstrous Abomination Mouse
description: Unimaginably frightening and terrifyingly strong, these are the most ambitious of creations yet! These abominations are constructed with the spare parts left over from the other "experiments". But don't let that fool you! Instead of only having part of the power of all these other mice, they seem to have all of the power, multiplied!

name: Phase Zombie
description: Cyborg mice whose cybernetics outlive their living bodies.  Puppeteered by their mechanical augments to continue seeking out the rift mist that they draw power from.

name: Plutonium Tentacle Mouse
description: Plagued by a chain of erratic mutations caused by an infusion with a rare pink plutonium, this tentacle terror ravages the toxic terrain of the rift.  Furious at her new protrusions, she is bent on destroying anyone who looks too happy.

name: Pneumatic Dirt Displacement Mouse
description:
Built to dig, dig, dig! The Pneumatic Dirt Displacement Mouse gets wireless instructions sent to him through his receiver tail. He spends his time digging tunnels, passages and levelling out the land as required.

These mice seem to be preparing for some kind of unknown major construction or possible excavation project.

name: Portable Generator Mouse
description:
Nothing is more frustrating than being on the cusp of victory when your mechanical arm runs out of juice! This has happened so many times that the rift mice have come up with a solution. The more power-hungry of the mice have been issued a companion Portable Generator Mouse to hang around with them to recharge them should they even run low on electricity.

This mouse is so dedicated to its task, that the only way to distract it is to arm Magical String Cheese when there is no mist in the air. On the plus side, the energy this mouse generates comes from a form of mist fusion, so it is always in possession of a bounty of Mist Canisters when caught.

Sometimes, when it thinks nobody is looking, this mouse pulls out a device with a big red button on top and stares at it long and hard. What does the button do? What is this mouse pondering while considering it? We may never know.

name: Prototype Mouse
description: These are the unfinished or prototype mice that are currently being kept under wraps.  Either out on a test run or more commonly, accidentally prematurely activated.  You never quite know what these mice can do or what they are capable of.

name: Super Mega Mecha Ultra RoboGold Mouse
description:
Irradiated beyond levels sustainable by living tissue, this mouse was designed to absorb high levels of radiation to de-contaminate areas, making them safe for work and inhabitable.

The radiation provides copious amounts of energy to expend making him the perfect guard for radiation work.

name: Rancid Bog Beast Mouse
description:
Icky, slimy, gross and smelly! The Rancid Bog Beast is a disgusting individual who has a particular penchant for playing with toxic goop. His razor sharp teeth are perfect for cutting and stripping cables, as well as punching holes through solid steel!

No matter how hard the scientists try, they cannot program out his desire for playing in toxic waste.

name: Revenant Mouse
description: Angry spirits trying to pass to the land of the dead sometimes get caught within what we know as the Rift.  Trapped in a new, corporeal form from contact with Rift Mist, these mice seek to return to the living and resume the life that was taken away from them.

name: Rifterranian Mouse
description:
Surveyor of the Rift. His purpose is to travel the vast unknowns of the rift and familiarize himself with them. His memory banks are loaded with geographical data and environmental analysis.

He can prove difficult to catch because of his astute awareness of the land.

Some say his knowledge is so extensive, he's discovered secrets about where the very first mice came from!

name: Robat Mouse
description: The eyes in the skies!  The Robat is a silent sentry providing surveillance of experimentation and construction zones.  Invaluable for monitoring ongoing projects and making sure everyone stays in line.

name: Radioactive Ooze Mouse
description:
This glowing mouse loves deep, dark and dank places where you can find the most potent radioactive ooze lying around. Designed to seek out and collect irradiated waste, he easily gets distracted by the sticky, green stuff. Some are gone for so long that they grow strange moulds and fungus.

Decontaminating your trap after catching this mouse is a nightmare!

Occasionally, this mouse can be seen eating a disgusting-looking cake topped with toxic ooze. Ew!

name: Surgeon Bot Mouse
description:
Life-saving surgeries can only be performed by the most technically skilled of surgeons, but life-altering surgeries can only be performed by the most ethically-compliant surgeons. Lacking any skilled surgeons that would willingly perform the experiments and augmentations required by the Burroughs Rift mice, they created this Rift Surgeon Bot to operate for them.

This mouse has had a hand in practically every alteration and augmentation in the Burroughs Rift.

name: Tech Ravenous Zombie
description: Using the latest and "greatest" technology, some rift mice have been able to keep their brain alive well beyond the lifespan of their bodies.  Fighting an ever losing battle against their cybernetics for control, eventually their mind breaks and falls victim to insanity. These dangerous, unpredictable, and maniacally vicious monsters are the result!

name: Toxic Avenger Mouse
description: Freedom fighter for pollution!  This mouse does her best to clean out the cleaners and keep the dirt dirty.  Most of the power derived in the Burroughs Rift comes from the intense toxic radiation produced from the toxic spill's rift counterpart, and she spends her time guarding the spill, "dealing with" any who would come to clean it.

name: Toxikinetic Mouse
description:
Able to telekinetically control the radioactive ooze that floods out of the lab, the Toxikinetic Mouse has the potential to be one of the most powerful mice in the Kingdom, if only she could learn to fully control her powers.

One trick she's picked up is the ability to fly by keeping a thin layer of ooze surrounding herself at all times. Some day, she theorizes she'll be able to become invulnerable by selectively hardening this layer of ooze to deflect all incoming damage.

Some other mice have taken to calling her "Phoenix" behind her back because of her long red hair. But only behind her back. There's no telling what she'd do in response if she ever found out.

name: Zombot Unipire the Third
description: The third redesign of the Zombot Unipire is a real looker!  His solid steel chassis draped with a red velvet cape is topped with a perfectly synthesized unicorn horn.  The horn creates a trail of hopes and dreams that sometimes mesmerize even the unipire himself.  Fighting an internal struggle, he was programmed to do bad but wants to do good!

name: Candy Cat Mouse
description:
How can something so horrible dressed as one of the most proficient hunters of mousekind look so cute!  This delicious looking morsel covets quite the delectable looking confection!  
 
Good luck getting his claws off of his candy.

name: Candy Goblin Mouse
description: This hoarder of sweets can only be found in the Spooky Sandcastle. If you are lucky enough to catch one it will be sure to drop some of its prized possessions, at least the ones it has not yet eaten.

name: Grey Recluse Mouse
description: The definition of creepy and crawly! The Grey Recluse is one to watch out for while carefully hunting during Halloween. Even after being captured, his sticky webs have a way to tie up travellers and keep them from advancing.

name: Hollowed Mouse
description: Once a year the veil between our world and another weakens, bringing with it the threat of terrible demonic mice. During this dangerous time our most powerful hunters are requested to battle the forces that manage to escape the breach. Until recently this phenomena was known only to a few covert hunters but with the recent eruption of Rifts around the kingdom the haunted breach has gotten much larger and more dangerous. With armies ready to pour through led by these terrifying mice, it is more important than ever that our most powerful hunters be well equipped and choose to face these dangerous foes head on.

name: Mousataur Priestess Mouse
description:
She is the fierce guardian of the terror maze and her minions do her bidding, both rewarding the bravest of hunters while tricking others without remorse. Those who reach her at the end of the maze must both be wary of the prizes she grants and to never look her directly in the eye.

Some say defeating her grants freedom from the maddening labyrinth but others claim that upon meeting her, they now live a cursed life! Failures to attract and catch with their traps - was she to blame? Some hope that catching her might reverse the curse, or will it double it?

There's only one way to find out.

name: Shortcut Mouse
description:
In the old Haunted Territories, this mouse would zoom through the Corn Maze, zip through the Haunted Manor and fly through the Pumpkin Patch. He spent so much time around the Terrortories that he knew all the little secret paths, trap doors and alternate routes that allowed him to rush through it all in record time!

But everything changed when the Sandmouse attacked and this mouse had to learn its way through the Spooky Sandcastle.

name: Tricky Witch Mouse
description:
Dressed to impress this Halloween season, the Tricky Witch has pulled out all the stops and is wearing her finest hat and trick or treating attire. More for the trick than the treat, this cunning creature has crafted a charm specifically to do just that!

Her treat is a specially designed trick contained inside of her Shortcut Charms. Using them can cause you to rapidly progress through the Spooky Sandcastle OR will leave you left behind.

Use at your own risk as they can be a blessing as easily as a curse!

name: Builder Mouse
description: The head builder in charge of building any and all snow forts during the Great Winter Hunt. With a solid ice sledge hammer, some icy blueprints, and a penchant for building things, this looks to be the best qualified mouse for the job!

name: Frigid Foreman Mouse
description: This site supervisor and hands-on construction director is in charge of reading icy blueprints and making sure that all snow and ice forts in Gnawnia are up to code and built to specification.

name: Glacia Ice Fist
description: Hailing from the Glacial Alps of northern Gnawnia, this abominable snow beast is no stranger to the harsh conditions of an icy climate. The brutal cold has forged her into a frighteningly strong, resilient, and ruthless adversary. She wields a massive block of ice on her fist so effortlessly that no one knows for sure whether she is merely gripping it very tightly or whether it is actually an inseparable frozen appendage. Either way, no one wants to be nearby when she brings the hammer down!

name: Hoarder Mouse
description:
Hungry, hungry hoarder! Working hard at packing on those pounds to build a solid winter bulk! This mouse definitely won't be an easy pushover!

I think it may have been a slight mistake selecting this guy to be in charge of the rationing...

name: Miser Mouse
description:
The big, bad, and now broke corporate backer behind the failed Crystal Citadel escapade of December 2014. Not one to give up, he still has eyes to rebuild on that empty, vacant lot.

He still harbours a grudge at how the Vacant Lot was wasted for so many years on "fun" and "sharing holiday spirit" and is now just sitting unused and unprofitable... humbug! If he can ever get his hands on that prime land then maybe one day his empire might rise again...

name: Stuck Snowball Mouse
description:
This slick little guy has slipped and got himself stuck in snow! What's worse? He can't stop! Rolling and gaining momentum throughout the snowy hills, not one trap has yet been fast enough to catch and stop this sailing snowball!

How big will he get? Will he ever be stopped?

name: Tundra Huntress Mouse
description:
A fearsome fighter forged from the frozen tundras, the Tundra Huntress Mouse was found lost and all alone along a cold, barren strait of land. She found she was remarkably resilient to the cold and not only adapted incredibly well to it, she thrived in it.

Trained under the harshest of regimens, she has become a legendary warrior. Even the strongest of mice keep an eye out for this seasonal stalker.

name: Borean Commander Mouse
description:
The terrifying Borean Commander Mouse has a mimetic ice-alloy body, consisting of an interesting form of "liquid ice"-like nitrogen. This allows her to change her form and create different shapes out of her icy structure.

Many years ago, she lead an army of mice in constructing a Crystal Citadel of pure ice and from there she waged the greatest snowball fight that the Kingdom of Gnawnia had ever seen. Her plan was to create a permanent home to fend off the warmer weather so that she wouldn't have to disappear at the end of the season. Fortunately, the MouseHunters prevailed and now she is only able to return to the Kingdom when the weather allows.

Though she is typically constituted in the overall shape of a mouse, she may not even be one at all!

name: Red Coat Bear Mouse
description: The Red Coat Bear Mouse is adorned in a glorious coat of fur.  The fur varies in shades of red, directly reflecting how angry he is.  A fully rage-fueled super-bear will hunt you to the ends of the rift if it were not for your rather distracting cheese supply.

name: Monstrous Black Widow Mouse
description:
Lurking in the deepest, darkest and most dangerous parts of the Whisker Woods Rift lies the Monstrous Black Widow Mouse. Few dare to enter her realm of the forest as none have ever returned. Extremely fast, strong and agile, one has yet to escape her clutches!

When you see those red eyes pierce the darkness, it is too late to turn back.

name: Centaur Ranger Mouse
description:
The mighty Centaur Ranger Mouse, Warrior of the Whisker Woods. The hand of justice for those who wander too close to the heart of the forest without welcome. One would do well to avoid upsetting this silent watcher.

Most people won't tell you this but his giant helm is to cover up his soft side. This way, no one can see him cry when he witnesses injustice and destruction within the Whisker Woods Rift.

name: Karmachameleon Mouse
description:
This sly guy is planning something mischievous! That smile is suspiciously sneaky. Known for their cunning and craftiness, these sticky Karmachameleon mice are tough to get rid of without losing copious amounts of cheese!

Their karmaflage does well to disguise their true feelings and intent until it is too late! Only they truly know what hides behind their smile.

name: Cherry Sprite Mouse
description: A lovely little Cherry Sprite Mouse!  This spirit loves to dance and sing as sweetly as the cherries they love and embody.  They are known to be quite troublesome and mischievous, though, especially when the cherries run out!

name: Naturalist Mouse
description: Hip and in the now, wearing the latest in all-natural growth wear, he sports the tastiest natural growth potions around!  This nature-loving scientist works diligently on his all-natural organic products and concoctions.  Guaranteed to bring you one step closer to nature than you thought possible!

name: Cyclops Barbarian Mouse
description: Short, stocky, strong, savage and uncivilized. Cyclops Barbarian mice are conquerors!  They seek to take the Whisker Woods Rift for their own and, with the opening of the rift, they may attempt to expand their reign into Gnawnia!

name: Red-Eyed Watcher Owl Mouse
description:
The large Red-Eyed Watcher Owl Mouse keeps a safe distance from its prey. Observing from a distance, its tell-tale eyes burn deep into the soul. It's always looking for the perfect piece of cheese to strike.

Always waiting, watching...

name: Treant Queen Mouse
description: Ruler of the Whisker Woods Rift.  Centuries old, time has given her vast wisdom and strength. The Treant Queen Mouse keeps peace and order for all of the woodland mice.

name: Spirit of Balance
description:
The Spirit of Balance is a powerful being in her own right. She does her best to keep balance and order within the woods, keeping everything running in perfect harmony.

Her powers grow and nourish the flora and fauna of the forest. When needed, she uses them to cull and destroy those which do not belong and seek to ruin the balance.

name: Spirit Fox Mouse
description:
The Spirit Fox Mouse is quite playful and lively. When packs of them play and chase each other, they light up the woods and look like glowing dancing spirits.

Smart and cunning, they would be more difficult to catch aside from the fact that they enjoy toying with hunters traps!

name: Fungal Frog Mouse
description:
Happily hopping around the stagnant waters of the Whisker Woods Rift, this amphibious mouse has a natural defense of poisonous fungus that grows along its slimy exterior.

Definitely one mouse that's hard to hold on to! Although I don't know why you would want to in the first place...

name: Crazed Goblin Mouse
description: Carnage and chaos is the definition of what it means to be a Crazed Goblin Mouse.  With their bone cudgels, skullcaps and gnarled facial features, these feral Goblin mice show that they have no fear!  They will charge and topple over their fallen brethren to grab cheese out of a trap while scavenging from those that were not quite so fortunate.

name: Gilded Leaf Mouse
description:
This mouse soaks up the golden rays of the sun leaving her skin looking like pure 24-carat gold!

Rumor has it that a small number of these mice are actually made of gold which make them one of the more tempting reasons to brave the rift.

name: Winged Harpy Mouse
description: Graceful and angelic.  One of the most elegant creatures to soar the skies.  Their quick speed makes them hard to spot while in motion.  Hunters need to be agile, with quick-striking traps, as these mice do not stay stationary for too long!

name: Tri-dra Mouse
description:
A three-headed, three-eyed guardian of the Whisker Woods Rift. A patient protector of those that dwell within the forest. Don't let his calm demeanour fool you; it would not be wise to anger this mighty beast!

Catching mice in the Deep Lagoon will eventually enrage him enough to emerge from the depths.

name: Mossy Moosker Mouse
description: One with nature.  The Mossy Moosker Mouse finds shelter in the thick, deep nest of trees within the rift that are his home.  Living in a perfectly symbiotic relationship with his environment, he is literally part of the forest.  Tread lightly!

name: Nomadic Warrior Mouse
description: The Nomadic Warrior mice are fierce and more aggressive than the Nomad mice of our kingdom.  Honed from roaming the harsh environment of the rift, she brandishes her blade in search of a challenge instead of a home.

name: Medicine Mouse
description:
Native to the Whisker Woods Rift, these traditional spirit healers are revered for their restorative powers. By securing some "help" from the spirit world, these Medicine mice focus their lost energies into revitalizing the land and the mice of the rift.

Be careful when messing with these mice. You wouldn't want any bad juju!

name: Grizzled Silth Mouse
description:
Old and wise, the Grizzled Silth Mouse is sought out for his great wisdom and he provides it to all who seek him out, even to hunters who try to capture him. He is quite elusive and prefers a hermit-like lifestyle, spending more time out of the water than in, which makes him harder to track.

Despite his age, he is not above a good fight, and will often challenge other mice with an aggressive stance.

name: Bloomed Sylvan Mouse
description: The ancient rift ancestor of the Sylvan Mouse in full bloom! They are quite scarce and skittish making them difficult to spot amongst the forest and foliage.  Once the flower on the tip of their tail opens and their facial blossoms bloom this mouse becomes quite a rare sight to behold!

name: Rift Tiger
description: Ferocious Rift Tiger mice stalk the Whisker Woods Rift looking for unsuspecting cheese.  With the lack of tall grass and bushes, these tigers have evolved special stripe-like pores which glow and emit rift-like mists to camouflage into their surroundings.

name: Twisted Treant Mouse
description:
Protector of the Whisker Woods Rift. This gnarled and twisted treant is the guardian of the forest. The magic locked away within the rift brings forth these guardians when they feel threatened!

This will be one tough brute to uproot!

name: Tree Troll Mouse
description: Pesky Tree Troll mice!  None too bright with skulls as thick as their leathery hide!  Worse than a bad case of termites, these goons leave all kinds of damage and destruction in their wake.  Even the other woodland mice don't seem to get along with them!

name: Water Sprite Mouse
description: These playful Water Sprite mice inhabit the Whisker Woods Rift, playing tricks and splashing other mice that get a little too close for a drink.  They also have a marvelous synchronized swimming routine if you're lucky enough to catch them at the right time!

name: Cranky Caterpillar Mouse
description: The rift isn't always a hospitable place to live and the Cranky Caterpillar mice have trouble finding ideal spots to pupate. Left in a semi-transformed state and never fully maturing into their fluttery flying forms, these mice often live grumpy lives, living out their days stuck between stages.

name: Gentleman Caller Mouse
description:
This guy has been working hard with the prospectors to increase his prospect of finding love! With some extra Fool's Gold in his pocket, he should be able to afford the finest fedora, silk shirt, and pantaloons to assist in his pursuit of a long-time crush.

He's still dealing with his most overwhelming adversary -- his own nerves! It looks like he's going to be at it for a LONG time.

name: Costumed Sheep Mouse
description: The Year of the Sheep brings soft and fluffy celebration! With it comes new and improved Ramming Speed, propelling the cruise ship to greater lengths!

name: Cupcake Cutie Mouse
description: Taking fashion tips indirectly from pastry chefs everywhere, this mouse loves to collect those beautifully decorated cupcakes and design her outfits after them.  From her pink icing coloured hair to her sprinkled beaded bracelets, all the way down to that custom made cupcake wrapper styled skirt.  A bundle of sweetness wrapped in a bow, just like a cupcake!

name: Cupcake Runner Mouse
description: That sugary sweet treat just can't be beat, and this mouse knows it!  Surging with sugar, this mouse has an insatiable desire for cupcakes and Cupcake Colby Cheese! These mice are especially active during birthday celebrations, where cupcakes are plentiful!

name: Chocolate Gold Foil Mouse
description:
A rare sight, indeed! The Chocolate Foil Mouse has come alive with magic during the Spring Egg Hunt! To keep herself from melting, she keeps covered in cool (and expensive) gold foil.

Attracted to all things gold, she covets this year's Golden Eggs. Catch her before she grinds them all up and turns them into unique body paint!

name: Bitter Root Mouse
description: One of the oldest living mice growing below the caverns.  Gnarled and aging but full of wisdom.  These mice thrive in the dark, damp and mouldy atmosphere, living for hundreds of years. The younger, more visibly vibrant mice of these old caves often ignore his sage advice, which is enough to make anyone bitter!

name: Cavern Crumbler Mouse
description: Caves crumble when the Cavern Crumbler comes crawling through! Features quite literally chiseled into their rocky surface from moving heavy stone all their lives makes each one look like their own unique living statue!

name: Crag Elder Mouse
description:
These mice are incredibly slow moving, much like the shifting tectonic plates beneath Gnawnia. The elders spend most of their time leaning up against the cavern walls, watching the younger mice and criticizing their life choices. They almost blend in completely with the rock walls, making it tough to spot out who it is exactly that's chastising you.

He's a real craggy one! Unless he gets his naps...

name: Crystal Behemoth Mouse
description:
This mouse is quite a rare sight! Its sleek, greasy flesh crackles with a powerful energy and it moves unlike anything the hunters of Gnawnia have ever seen before. Elegantly gliding through compacted earth, it's quite shocking to see how effortlessly this creature utterly destroys the rocks around it, as if nothing could possibly impede this beast. Fueled by Diamond Cheese, it's hard to believe that any trap could stop such raw power.

Make no mistake, though seemingly lacking anything resembling eyes, it is far from blind. This creature can probably sense you through even the thickest layers of rock.

name: Crystal Cave Worm Mouse
description: A mineral-seeking underground cave worm mouse! This mouse is as powerful as it is terrifying. They can pick up on their own vibrations that they create by tunneling though the earth to "echolocate" minerals in the ground. Watch your step when one is near; the ground below your feet may be less stable than it appears...

name: Crystal Controller Mouse
description:
One with the crystals, the Crystal Controller can crystallize any liquid on command. He can instantaneously crystallize his sweat into a protective suit of hardened crystal whenever threatened and, like a porcupine, he can shake the shards loose, tossing these crystals offensively at a predator.

He can step across a pond safely, solidifying the liquid below his feet, but the crystals he leaves behind dissolve easily in water and have a uniquely salty flavour to them! Ew.

name: Crystal Golem Mouse
description: Powerful resonating crystals make up the body of this crystallographical golem.  The energy coursing through these shards generates the power that allows the golem to change shape from its crystalline structure to its solid, cheese-loving mouse body.

name: Crystal Lurker Mouse
description:
A mouse consisting of a pure, hardened crystalline structure, he is highly unstable and insatiably hungry for gemstones. Its supernova core immediately heats up the consumed materials to repair, extend and expand its body. The immense heat and pressure inside the chest cavity of this mouse super-heats the air around it, causing small bits of rock to float within the cloud of hot air surrounding the mouse.

The Crystal Lurker always stays lean and never grows too large. The constant and vigorous digging and foraging through the caverns can cause quite a few chips and broken pieces!

name: Crystal Observer Mouse
description:
These mice seek out, sort and store all manner of minerals, gemstones, diamonds, and other delicious crystalline edibles within the Fungal Cavern. They determine which stones are suitable for consumption of energy.

With an eye for clarity, cut, karat and colour, this gemologist is always on the lookout for that deliciously special gemstone snack! Mmm!

name: Crystal Queen Mouse
description:
Constantly competing to be outfitted with the best crystals available, the Crystal Queen scavenges for gems to flaunt and display proudly to the other mice. Loyal followers help gather crystals and share them with her to hopefully garner affection for their hard work and devotion.

The Queen with the biggest crystal flourish gives all the orders!

name: Crystalback Mouse
description: Covered in softly glowing crystals, this mouse provides much needed lighting to the mice working deep underground.  Scurrying around through the network of caves creates quite a light show spectacular, if you get the right viewing angle!

name: Crystalline Slasher Mouse
description:
Driven mad with mineral madness, this stalker sulks around searching for delicious minerals to feast upon, even if they do not belong to him. Mice are lucky if they only encounter a Crystal Slasher once in their life.

Despite his unpredictable rage, this mouse actually gets along quite well with the Fungal Fodder mice. Maybe it's because they don't carry precious stones around with them, but together they get into some serious trouble!

name: Diamondhide Mouse
description: Deep within the hardest crusts of the winding caverns lies the Diamondhide! With a tough leathery hide, encrusted with super-hard diamonds, this mouse can claw through solid steel and eat gemstones and diamonds raw for breakfast!

name: Dirt Thing Mouse
description: Quite dirty and mossy!  This mouse embodies a living dirt golem.  Growing up underground without much running water can lead to this kind of look.

name: Floating Spore Mouse
description: A floating fungal spore mouse that has uprooted and is beginning to look for a new, more fertile home to sprout roots and grow!

name: Funglore Mouse
description: The fabled mouse made strictly from living fungal energy! Constructed from cascading Cavern Fungus similar to what grows along the cavern walls.  Tough to spot but this mouse will reward you with quite the fungal bounty if caught.

name: Gemorpher Mouse
description:
This mouse has learned to adapt its body to its environment using biological camouflage. Able to morph into any of the geological stones located within the Fungal Cavern allows them to hide from and surprise others.

Current reigning hide and seek champion of the Fungal Cavern!

name: Gemstone Worshipper Mouse
description: Obsessed with the shiny, powerful rocks found below the surface.  These mice spend their lives scouring for the biggest, brightest gemstones they can find to lord over their peers.

name: Huntereater Mouse
description:
The Huntereater is friend to no mouse or man! Encrusted with gemstones, it waits for other gem-enriched mice to wander by looking for food before ambushing them! Her blood-red ruby-like tail is incredibly beautiful and appears incredibly similar to a Flameshard, the symbol of the Marching Flame of the Fiery Warpath! Did the Warmonger create the totems for his army in the image of the Huntereater's tail, or is this the source of the Flameshard itself?

Though precious and beautiful, the tail is extremely venomous and tricks other mice into grabbing at it, believing it to be a simple gemstone.

name: Lumahead Mouse
description:
One of the most illuminating mice to be found in the Caverns. Fancy and very old fashioned, he sports the latest in fungal flourished pants topped with a fancy fungal fedora.

This mouse pulls off a look that not many can.

name: Mouldy Mole Mouse
description: The Mouldy Mole shuffles around mostly blind but still able to see the light fluorescent glow emanating from the various fungi throughout the caverns.  Fumbling around in the dark, he sometimes mistakes stones for tantalizing mould spores resulting in one too many chipped teeth!

name: Mush Mouse
description: Preferring to take shelter deep underground, the Mush mice pick nice, damp and warm locations to spend the majority of their life.  Mostly stationary, they will uproot and hop around when something interesting captures their eye.  This is probably the one mouse that would be easier to catch without a trap by just picking them up!

name: Mushroom Sprite Mouse
description:
This devilish Mushroom Sprite Mouse haunts the depths of the Fungal Cavern. A terror in her own right, she goes about screaming and spooking those that share the dark caverns below. Her camouflage allows her to scurry between the fungus without being seen.

If a mushroom looks out of place or there is suddenly a new patch of fungus that wasn't there before, watch out!

name: Nightshade Masquerade Mouse
description:
The highest class from the lowest depths of the caverns. Dressed in a glowing nightshade leaf gown accompanied by a fancy masquerade mask, this mouse is trying its best to be fancy among the filth and fungus.

Her glamorous lifestyle has given her a taste for SUPER|brie+ and she will only make an appearance in public if there is some of this highly sought after cheese on your trap.

name: Quillback Mouse
description: These sleepy little guys take it easy down under.  They mostly live hunched over and roll around looking for food.  Once they find it, they usually nap and keep it safe and warm underneath them leaving a nice, warm breakfast for when they decide to wake up.  Their big, sharp quills keep other mice away, giving them all the time in the world to finish their food.

name: Shattered Obsidian Mouse
description:
Raw, spiritual mousey energies from within Gnawnia have exploded throughout the deep caverns. The mousey energy looks to consume raw gemstones and minerals to keep a physical form preventing them from dispersing back into the ether.

Without constantly consuming minerals, these mice's bodies will become unstable and fall apart.

name: Spiked Burrower Mouse
description: Shows up when least expected, the Spiked Burrower swims through the dirt as though it were water, thanks to his many spines. This makes him one tough target to track down!

name: Splintered Stone Sentry Mouse
description: Posted up at major intersections throughout the caverns, the sentries make sure everyone keeps moving and nothing clogs up the passageways.  It is very tempting for those fungus mice to just post up and start growing in the most inconvenient locations, so someone has to keep them moving along!

name: Spore Muncher Mouse
description: Spore Muncher mice have a poor sense of sight that is offset by the glowing spores that grow along their backs.  This symbiotic relationship allows these mice to find other spores.  This is also partly self-preservation, as they tend to ignore any blue-hued fungus, thinking it could just be another Spore Muncher.

name: Sporeticus Mouse
description: The Sporeticus Mouse fights to lead his mousey brethren out from the darkness of the caves and out into the sun!  Whispers of a world beyond the closed, cavernous walls, with cheese beyond the imagination, drive this little explorer to find a way out!

name: Stalagmite Mouse
description: The Stalagmite Mouse wanders the cavern floors collecting all the delicious mineral deposits dripping from the caverns stalactites.  Whatever doesn't make it in his mouth usually ends up collecting upon his back.

name: Stone Maiden Mouse
description: A marvelous and statuesque mouse held together and animated by some pretty powerful fungal tendrils. It slowly stalks the cavernous halls of the underground passageways, its pounding footsteps echoing loudly.

name: Ancient Scribe Mouse
description: The ancient scribes of the Scholar District have mastered many spells and collected many scrolls throughout their studies.  They take their lifetime of learning and transcribe it upon sacred parchments to be stored and used within the Dark Library by up and coming students.

name: Ash Golem Mouse
description: The unrelenting Ash Golem Mouse trudges through the endless hallways and corridors of the Labyrinth, fueling itself with remnants of traps and cheese left behind by those defeated by the maze.

name: Automated Stone Sentry Mouse
description: A once simple stone golem mouse hailing from the Fungal Caverns, this construct has been artfully reforged by the Arcanite Golem Re-Fabricants Co. An extremely advanced but long forgotten practice that fuses living stone with an impressive mixture of technology and refined magics. The final result is an incredibly adept, durable and dangerous construct that never rests or ages. If you run into these mice, you are likely getting closer to the either the Tech Research Center or the Manaforge itself!

name: Battle Cleric Mouse
description:
A protective clergy of battle-ready mice guard the inner-most areas of the Fealty District from intruders. Extensively skilled individuals are hand picked and personally trained by the currently appointed Paladin.

Heavy, ceremonial armour and specially-forged flanged powermaces are a clear sign that the mouse in front of you is a Battle Cleric Mouse!

name: Corridor Bruiser Mouse
description: These mice live out their entire lives within the Labyrinth. As these mice know nothing beyond the constantly shifting maze walls, they have no issue navigating it with ease and have been known to track and mislead others for sport.

name: Dark Templar Mouse
description:
A wealthy order of knights left over from a crusade held long ago against Zokor. Dressed in expensive armour and weaponry, they are ready to hold their ground against the toughest of invaders.

With years of experience and training, these templars are still fighting a battle from decades ago!

name: Decrepit Tentacle Terror
description:
This aged, ancient, elderly, broken down, exhausted, decrepit, over-the-hill terror has been lying in wait for what seems to be an eternity to defend this long lost city district. This horror is kept alive by the same ancient powers that flow through the Manaforge, the Dark Library, and the Templar's Sanctum.

Not nearly as powerful as she once was, this shade of her former self is still quite formidable. In all of these years she still has not been replaced as the primary guardian to the hidden inner chambers of the city.

name: Drudge Mouse
description: Those who defy the city are given the choice to redeem themselves by serving as its defenders within the dangerous Labyrinth or spend the rest of their short mortal lives in the bowels of the city. Those who choose redemption become the Fealty Initiates and can work their way up the ranks to become even the most honoured guardians, but only if their loyalty has been tested to the limits and proven true. Most don't really make it out of the initiate phase, but hope can be a powerful thing when you're tasked with defending endless corridors with only a well-used sword, some inactive stonework armour and a tattered cloak.

name: Ethereal Guardian Mouse
description: A summoned ethereal spirit, held within the physical realm contained inside of magically enchanted vestments.  Brought forth by powerful casters within the Scholar District to patrol and guard their deepest secrets.

name: Exo-Tech Mouse
description: The Tech District's strongest weakest mouse!  The Exo-Tech has developed an advanced exo-skeleton to augment his older, feeble body.   By flexing his body's strongest muscle, his mind, he can hit as hard and fast as solving quantum entanglement theory!

name: Sir Fleekio Mouse
description: Swooned over by maiden mice everywhere, this is the most decorated, undefeated defender and combatant of the Fealty District.  Donned in custom silver armour, which looks great but has minimal effectiveness, perfect for a fighter that doesn't get hit!  The matching silver faceplate protects his perfectly symmetrical features from damage, mostly from wild debris kicked up from his furious swings.

name: Fungal Technomorph Mouse
description:
Once a local resident of the fungal section of the Labyrinth, this mouse was turned into a monstrous technological abomination in the name of science. A techno-tumor on its back is wired directly into its nervous system to allow complete remote control and provide additional offensive capabilities.

It is a biomechanical menace with no fear or desire for self-preservation. Used as one of the last lines of defence against intruders.

name: Hired Eidolon Mouse
description: Possessing sacred gold and jeweled armour with equally exquisite materials, these spectres are interested in only one thing: Treasure!  Handsomely paid for their services, they haunt the halls of the Labyrinth closest to the richest vaults within Zokor, guarding them from any potential invaders.

name: Lost Mouse
description: There is a rumour circling around, stating that beyond this impossible Labyrinth lies a city made of pure gold, ripe for plundering. Mice from far and wide have made attempts to uncover the maze's secrets, but everyone who has come back did so empty handed. Those who never returned continue to wander the outer halls of this constantly changing maze, unable to escape. They aggressively attack anyone who might carry supplies so they may continue their hopeless search.

name: Lost Legionnaire Mouse
description: In all honesty, the Lost Legionnaire Mouse can't make whiskers or tails out of the Labyrinth.  No matter how hard he tries, he always ends up in the wrong part of the maze, wandering aimlessly for hours, before finally finding himself back at another intersection he SWEARS he already passed...

name: Manaforge Smith Mouse
description:
Master of the Manaforge, these incredible smiths use this workshop to imbue metal and stone with enriched magical force to create the city’s tools, weapons and eternal golem guardians. Some researchers suspect that the original smiths that created the Manaforge also created the impossibly complex mechanisms that bring the Labyrinth to life.

Strength, endurance and high intelligence make these mice quite difficult to capture, especially since they understand the mechanics behind hunters traps.

name: Paladin Weapon Master Mouse
description: Forged within the sacred flames of the Templar's Sanctum, the Paladin Weapon Master Mouse has become most proficient with many of the ingenious weapon designs produced within the Manaforge. He is a deadly combatant and is armed to the teeth and outfitted in the finest armour and weapons the Manaforge can produce.

name: Masked Pikeman Mouse
description:
Hauling a pike into battle offers a lot more flexibility in offensive and defensive options. When pikemen get together, they can form walls of spikes known as a phalanx, preventing safe passage.

Their pikes are specially crafted and forged with an imprint of the Labyrinth that they are responsible to patrol and protect. Once the Labyrinth shifts, their shift is over and they switch with their relief pikeman.

These mice wear masks to confuse and frighten intruders. You may escape one Masked Pikeman to just run into him again, and again, and again... Or is it just another one?

name: Matron of Machinery Mouse
description: All of the technological advances found within the Labyrinth and Zokor first originated within the Tech Research Center, usually from the brains of these matrons.  Their minds are networked together allowing them to collaborate and access each others' vast knowledge within seconds to create new schematics, upgrades and algorithms for new and existing technologies.

name: Matron of Wealth Mouse
description:
Living in the lap of luxury, this wealthy mouse watches over the Treasury District and manages the city's money. Not one to shy away from the good things in life, she tends to allocate a "little" more towards her own wages. With all the riches contained in the vault, who could tell if any went missing, right?

That gem-encrusted crystal sword and golden goblet were a justified bonus for her hard work and dedication! After all, without her spending the city's money, why would the mice be motivated to earn more?

name: Mimic Mouse
description: The Mimic Mouse is a magical mouse created by the scholars that reside in Zokor to protect their vast treasures and valuables.  Made to resemble valuable treasure chests, these mice sit, waiting patiently until an unsuspecting intruder tries to take one home. Just when you think you're safe... SNAP!

name: Mind Tearer Mouse
description:
Just as the Labyrinth takes its toll, right after the mental fatigue kicks in and your mind grows weary, tired and confused, that's when the Mind Tearer mice strike! Using their magical mind-rending abilities, they sense out weak minds and lash out at any remaining sanity, tearing it asunder.

Those left in their wake are reduced to nothing more than babbling messes, barely able to determine left from right, let alone navigate the Labyrinth. They are doomed to wander the maze for the rest of their lives, or... until they run out of cheese and have to travel to a nearby shoppe.

name: Shadow Stalker Mouse
description:
Living within the deep shadows that are cast throughout the Labyrinth and Zokor, the Shadow Stalker Mouse hunts his prey silently from the darkness. He can slip into complete obscurity so long as even the slightest sliver of shadow lies before him.

Once his hiding place is disturbed, he slowly materializes into this nightmare, but only briefly and sometimes not at all. To this mouse, light is the antithesis to his existence, and he will never leave the safety of the shadows if a hunter is illuminated by the light of Glowing Gruyere or something just as bright.

name: Molten Midas Mouse
description:
Living within the lavish luxuries of the treasure-filled areas of Zokor lies this viscous liquid-like mouse. He can heat his body to such an extreme temperature that he can melt and then absorb nearby molten gold to increase his body mass.

He has grown quite literally attached to the gold and jewels that surround him.

name: Mush Monster Mouse
description: The mighty Mushroom Monster Mouse is made from a mangled, mildewy, moist and mouldy maze of mushrooms! Meandering mindlessly in the murky, matchless and mostly undisturbed domains of the maze, these monstrosities remain.  Their main milieu is an impeccable mix of modes that manages meaty mushroom multiplications, emboldening the mice to mature massively and mightily.

name: Mushroom Harvester Mouse
description:
These mice march through the damp, fungal-infested corners of the Labyrinth, swinging sickles in what seems to be a most futile effort to cut down on the encroaching mushroom population. They started sending these individuals out once the fungus got so dense that it halted the operations of the Labyrinth's mechanical corridors.

The corridors are still a mushy mess but everything is at least now functioning. Once in a while, the fungus gunks up the works, but these mice make short work of it!

name: Mystic Guardian Mouse
description:
Looking upon this mouse, it may appear to have physical form, but it is cold and void of life. It does not eat cheese, it merely senses your cheese and hunts you down if you wander too closely to its home.

The story goes... There was once a scholar from Zokor who created magical guardians to protect the city's mysterious Dark Library. These guardians were powerful and kept the library safe... Too safe. This scholar, thinking he could claim the entire Scholar District for his own, commanded his guardians to prevent anyone from coming near the grounds. Much devastation was wrought and some of the knowledge stored within the library was lost before he could be stopped. When his plan was finally foiled, as punishment, his material form was divided and forever bound to his constructs in order to repay the city for the countless years of knowledge that was forever lost.

name: Mystic Herald Mouse
description:
An ethereal creature created by powerful magi to guard the scholarly halls within the Labyrinth. They alert others of intruders' presence with their echoing wails of discouragement, demoralizing them from their course, making the maze seem futile in an effort to drive them away.

These mice are deemed to be ghosts of the dead who have fallen to these halls long, long ago.

name: Mystic Scholar Mouse
description:
The most powerful students of the ancient and arcane arts are sent out from the inner study halls to map and study the almost living Labyrinth. It seems as though the mice themselves may not even know how this gigantic maze works or who was behind it.

These scholars do their best to decipher its cryptic workings and try to solve this grand mystery.

name: Nightshade Fungalmancer Mouse
description: These fungalmancers have picked up a thing or two from the scholars practicing their magics throughout the Labyrinth.  Usually hidden from sight beneath their leaves, they absorb the magical energies cast out from other mice and harness them within their roots.  They wait for unsuspecting intruders upon which to test their new powers.

name: Nightshade Nanny Mouse
description: These nannies nurse their bundle of spores until they are ready to be released.  Quite dear and precious to her, she is armed with a crystalline spear capable of penetrating the strongest of metals with a parent's protective instincts to drive it.

name: Reanimated Carver Mouse
description:
From the magics contained within the Dark Library comes this corporeal creation. A reanimated mouse created to collect the corpses of intruders, salvage what pieces they can, and return these raw materials back to the mages that created him.

The fuming bowl of unknown magical contents keeps this corpse animated and prevents any further deterioration of the vessel. Hunters have tried to retrieve these bowls from the mice after capture, only to find them empty and their smoke extinguished.

name: Retired Minotaur Mouse
description:
Once young and lively, this minotaur loved racing through the hallways of the Labyrinth, chasing down hunters and mice alike, howling and bellowing with delight as they scurried at the mere sound of his hooves on the cobbled floors. But now, it seems he has run his last lap of the maze, and has settled down into cozy end-life routines. Donning his fuzzy slippers in his favourite easy chair (which is a giant sack of gold), this retired beast has had his pension paid out in full and has relocated to his secret inner chamber to enjoy his retirement in peace and quiet.

The same shenanigans that used to bring him joy now only cause him grief, and he can be seen shaking his fist from atop his tower at the other mice hustling and bustling in the city. All that noise, all that racket! What a grumpy old grump this once playful beast has become...

But even in his twilight and seemingly endless misery, he still manages to let a small grin spread across his lips whenever he causes a mouse to jump in fear at the sound of his snort or the clipping of his hooves.

No one has broken into his private chambers and lived to tell the tale. Rumor has it that he stores many great and valuable items on opulent displays. Perhaps a resourceful hunter can find a way in and nab one of these rare treasures before being caught!

name: RR-8 Mouse
description: The Rolling Rat Model 8 is a security droid built to efficiently travel the Labyrinth and "rat out" any intruders to the main city.  The spikes added to this model allow it to traverse the walls and ceilings with ease.

name: Sanguinarian Mouse
description: Powerful students that study the darker arts revolving around mental sacrifice.  Sanguinarians derive power from fresh knowledge, provided willingly from apprentice students.  Not much is required, only a few memories or so, but the results are quite astounding!

name: Solemn Soldier Mouse
description:
Vowed to protect the royalty of Zokor, these solemnly sworn-in soldiers commit their lives to the cause. Countless generations of their family lineage grow up and take up the guard as part of their heritage.

Armed to the teeth and dressed in fine plate armour, these soldiers make a formidable frontline defence!

name: Soul Binder Mouse
description:
Master of the Dark Library, enslaver of souls and an all-powerful wizard of the unknown. He believes himself to be a supreme ruler amongst all mice and is looked up to as one by his followers.

All mystics and mages of Zokor worship him. They follow his guidance and teachings in pursuit of becoming all-powerful like him. Unfortunately for them, the most powerful of his closest assistants become enslaved by him, feeding off their power and dooming them to eternal servitude.

name: Summoning Scholar Mouse
description: From the Ancient Academy of Summoning, these students venture out into the Labyrinth to practice their arts.  It is the only safe place where accidental summoning of powerful creatures could be beneficial, as the mess is mostly cleaned up by the shifting of the hallways. Can't find the dust swept under the rug if the rug itself can't be found!

name: Tech Golem Mouse
description: These mice are the guardian sentinels for the technologically advanced sections of the Labyrinth. They are designed to ward off and swarm invaders in an attempt to halt their progress.  Their advanced cranial capacity allows them to memorize countless permutations of paths making them nearly impossible to evade.

name: Treasure Brawler Mouse
description:
Putting his money where your mouth is! He fends off intruders by giving them exactly what they want, a sack of gold straight to the kisser! He likes to ambush hunters from inside piles of gold or from within treasure chests.

He's not afraid to throw his money around! Literally!

name: Dire Lycan Mouse
description: Bigger, badder, meaner and more hairier than its smaller cousin.  The Dire Lycan is a fierce monster whose transformation is amplified by the spirit of the Halloween season.

name: Gourd Ghoul Mouse
description: The ghoulish Gourd Ghoul conceals himself among the innocent pumpkins residing in the pumpkin patch.  When no one is watching, his body emerges from the hideous pumpkin as he floats towards his victims.  If spotted or threatened, he immediately vanishes and leaves behind his head, waiting for the coast to be clear before emerging once more.

name: Hollowed Minion Mouse
description:
Breaching through the veil in torrents of fire, these minions come out in flaming swarms, making them a little too hot to handle. With a stronger connection to the Rift plane, they can open small holes to their home and summon roaring flames at will.

When captured, let stand for 5 minutes to reach room temperature before handling.

name: Bonbon Gummy Globlin Mouse
description: Discarded Halloween candies, partially eaten or otherwise neglected and thrown away, have been absorbing evil from the Halloween spirits that have passed. They have slowly stuck together and rolled up into a horrifying mass, congealing into a massive ghoulish glob.

name: Maize Harvester Mouse
description:
Conjured to haunt the Corn Maze and stalk those who try to seek passage through it.  Reaping through the corn creating new twists and turns in all sorts of wrong directions, scaring the unfortunate down the wrong path.

Beware!  The corn is coming...

name: Spectral Butler Mouse
description: Continuing into the afterlife in servitude, the Spectral Butler Mouse is at your beck and call to satisfy any of your undead needs.  Being both a blessing and a curse, he continues to serve in death, until death... Your death that is!

name: Teenage Vampire Mouse
description: A young, flighty and bitey, brand new vampire!  Experiencing the spirit of Halloween for the first time as a vampire, where she can come out of the shadows and express herself without fear of judgement of her new, bloodsucking self. Once a shy loner, this seemingly dressed-up trick-or-treater is actually just one of the ghouls!

name: Black Diamond Racer Mouse
description: Speed queen of the slopes! The Black Diamond Racer has earned her name by dominating all Black Diamond courses throughout Gnawnia.  She has the fastest times and quickest reflexes, and she makes sure you know it! She rides on a sleek Black Diamond Quartz toboggan made with REAL quartz diamonds!

name: Double Black Diamond Racer Mouse
description:
Cool, calm and collected. No longer after fame, fortune and glory, this mouse is on a lonely quest to prove to the mountain itself that he is worthy of its slopes. He fears nothing except for dishonoring the mountain peak.

Using the rawest form of Black Diamond Quartz for his toboggan gives him the most durable material but at the cost of comfort. The board is so rigid that it becomes an extension of his very soul.

"Become one with the toboggan, become one with the mountain, become one with yourself."

name: Free Skiing Mouse
description:
A speed-seeking, free-skiing snow demon! As fast on its feet as it is on its toboggan. This beast literally eats the competition. With teeth like those, one can't help but wonder how many skiers it may have swallowed!

If you race with it, you definitely do NOT want to lose!

name: Young Prodigy Racer Mouse
description:
The apprentice of an old, retired racer, this mouse is the youngest prodigy to hit the slopes. A young and bright shining star of the newbie courses who's shredding powder and putting up some serious times!
