Legend has it that this mouse is destined to bring balance to the force of gravity on the slopes...

"Now THIS is toboggan racing!"

name: Nitro Racer Mouse
description: Not one to be left in the snow, she blasts down the mountain with canisters of nitro to keep her top speed maxed.  It's all about the speed!  Greasy, lightning fast speed!

name: Sporty Ski Instructor Mouse
description:
His state of the art skintight skiwear lets him cut through the chilly air with minimal resistance, letting him keep up with the fastest toboggans using only his skis! His true goal is to garner fame by winning races so that his classes can grow in popularity!

"Feels like I'm wearing nothing at all!"

name: Toboggan Technician Mouse
description: A retired racer still burning with toboggan passion.  Now putting his years of experience towards making the latest and greatest snow shredding slope speeders.

name: Rainbow Racer Mouse
description:
The rockstar of the toboggan racing world. Everyone who is anyone in this sport knows of the Rainbow Racer Mouse. Cutting edge toboggan tech keeps her speed maxed and obstacles are a thing of the past!

She doesn't race well with others and has a few dirty tricks up her sleeve to keep her lead.

name: Costumed Monkey Mouse
description:
The Year of the Monkey brings fiery and majestic celebration! With it comes the powerful Monkey Fling ability, which can throw the cruise ship great distances across the water!

The monkey is strong and wise, but also a bit of a troublemaker! You'll need to hit top speed in order to catch up to this mouse!

name: Cupcake Camo Mouse
description: Attempting to be clever, this mouse has disguised himself as a coveted rainbow cupcake.  Hoping to be able to get close and steal some easy cupcakes, he has quickly discovered that this may not have been the best idea as both mice and hunters are now after him!

name: Cupcake Candle Thief Mouse
description:
Crazy for candles, this Cupcake Candle Thief Mouse will mercilessly dive right through any cupcake to get to its brightly burning centerpiece. Something about those lit sticks of wax are just too irresistible to this little guy. Burning with desire to obtain those candles, he will stop at nothing! He might love wax a bit TOO much...

Wonder why he needs all those candles...

name: Armored Archer Mouse
description: Upon their flying mist, these highly-skilled archers keep a keen eye over the Furoma Rift. They are incredibly fast and accurate.

name: Dancing Assassin Mouse
description: Stealthily these assassins flourish in their brightly-coloured garb which goes well with concealing them among the bright colours of their Rift environment. Concealed inside of their traditional robes are lethal weapons, drawn only as their hypnotic dance amuses their potential targets.

name: Master of the Chi Belt Mouse
description:
Sumos that have conquered great challenges will rise to the rank of Yokozuna. With the ability to harness their desire for cheese and release the greater strength inside, their internal struggle coupled with their great physical power creates a force to be reckoned with.

Weakening their strong composure and focus with the temptation of a delicious cheese could be their only weakness...

name: Student of the Chi Belt Mouse
description: Studying the essence of cheese through massive consumption, these sumos become an unstoppable force AND an immovable object and use their weight to fend off attackers. The more body weight that consists of cheese, the closer they become to enlightenment.

name: Master of the Chi Claw Mouse
description:
Masters of the mind, these mice have gone one step beyond meditation, reaching the early stages of enlightenment. Developing the ability to manifest their Chi into a physical form and project it from their bodies, their Chi bursts are so strong they can interrupt the natural electrical impulses that flow through the body, slowing or even stopping the heart.

Mind over matter over mouse.

name: Student of the Chi Claw Mouse
description: Meditating above the clouds, these students hone their minds to be as sharp as their claws. They focus their desire for cheese into Chi, a powerful energy used for attack as well as defence. Once focused, it can be difficult to break their concentration.

name: Grand Master of the Dojo Mouse
description: Master over mind, will stronger than weapons, a body no longer bound by hunger, a true master of the Three Ways, the Grand Master of the Dojo has access to almost limitless power which surges throughout their being. Most new Grand Masters are quick to give in and can burn out like a fading star. Those that truly hone and harness this form become incredible adversaries with terrible power.

name: Supreme Sensei
description:
The culmination of all knowledge and abilities of the Grand Pagoda are etched into the very bones of the Supreme Sensei. An absolute master of the Three Ways (the Fang, the Claw and the Belt), he oversees the operations of the three schools, keeping the students and masters on track and in shape.

Seeking the Supreme Sensei is a daunting task, requiring mastery of the three schools in the Grand Pagoda, true dedication, extreme discipline and intense training.

Otherworldly renown is bestowed upon those who best this ultimate master of martial combat!

name: Dumpling Delivery Mouse
description:
The most revered and skilled master of the Furoma Rift. Using an old and ancient Furoma recipe, this chef flies around delivering delicious dumplings to all of the hard-working mice. Cooking during flight time to maximize efficiency, she can easily feed hundreds of mice a day.

She fights hunger so they don't have to.

name: Master of the Chi Fang Mouse
description:
Warriors infused with magical weaponry and armours, these mice, once students of one, become masters of many. Upon proving mastery of the Fang, their followers gain access to the many ancient and powerful weapons within the Grand Pagoda's armoury.

Masters of the Fang fight with the fury of the many warriors that have come before them.

name: Student of the Chi Fang Mouse
description: An astute student of Sōjutsu, their life is dedicated to the art of the spear. Their spears are known as fangs, as they are a sharp extension of their own natural defence. They study tirelessly to perfect their form, hoping to one day become a true Master of the Fang. Nothing will stand in their way of completing their training.

name: Ascended Elder Mouse
description:
With lives nearing completion, their bodies have grown weak in their old age but their spirits have grown strong, so strong that they can barely be contained in any physical realm. Focused on finding "oneness" through menial but meaningful work, their training has come full circle, back to where students begin. Sweeping the grand floors of the Grand Pagoda, they find greater meaning, purpose, humility, and spiritual wholeness through this act of cleanliness and self-sacrifice.

They may look hapless and powerless, but don't let that fool you... Striking one down will make them become more powerful than you can possibly imagine.

name: Shaolin Kung Fu Mouse
description: Practitioners of Shaolin Kung Fu, these mice train in solitude and their teachings are separate from the three major schools found in the Grand Pagoda.

name: Wandering Monk Mouse
description:
Believed to have learned all they can from the ancient teachings offered within the Grand Pagoda, these monks roam around in search of higher learning and teachings from the outside world. An endless search for stronger opponents, new techniques, and a mastery of life drive these mice to explore the outer most regions of the Rift Plane.

Hopefully you encounter one leaving the Grand Pagoda in search of new teachings, and not one returning with experience and greater abilities...

name: Shinobi Mouse
description: Covert ninja warriors that flourish in the blanketing clouds of the mist, these mice are masters of guerrilla warfare. The Shinobi are an undocumented secret group of students that undergo specialized training. These mice stop at nothing to defend the Grand Pagoda from their enemies.

name: Militant Samurai Mouse
description: A powerful member of the highly disciplined military class of the Furoma Rift.  They devote their lives to the defence of the ancient Furoma Rift Pagoda and their sacred teachings.

name: Enlightened Labourer Mouse
description: Hard work and determination carve the path that these mice choose to reach enlightenment.  Humble, altruistic, and well-respected, these mice are highly sought after as there is constant need for their services and repairs.

name: Wave Racer Mouse
description: This mouse is ready to make a splash! The Wave Racer Mouse came at this from an interesting angle: She is prepared to play every sport ON the water! Maybe the messages got mixed up or maybe the competitive mice of the Tournament Hall are taking a brand new approach to aquatic athletics!

name: Creepy Marionette
description:
This once beautiful wood-carved ballerina doll is now nothing less than a horror show. Affixed atop spindly legs, it seemingly moves on its own, an invisible force puppeteering the inanimate carving. The void of its eyes look to swallow the unfortunate souls who dare stumble into this Creepy Marionette in the dark.

"I've got no strings to hold me down..."

name: Sandmouse
description:
When you close your eyes at night, you open your mind...

Enter Sandmouse.

The Sandmouse wants to know if you're getting enough sleep these days. If not, he can probably help with that...

Those who have encountered him report having peculiar dreams in which they see a strange moon hanging over Gnawnia, much too close for comfort. Digby Scientists have confirmed that the moon is still at the same distance as it has ever been, so it's probably safe to assume the Sandmouse is conjuring these images. It should be nothing to worry about! Right...?

Sleep with one eye open and grip your pillowcase tight when you go trick-or-treating for this mouse!

name: Arcane Summoner Mouse
description: The Arcane Summoner has the ability to tap into the power locked within Bloodstone, a rare mineral found deep within the meteorite that only reveals itself in the deepest parts of night. With her understanding of these powers, she is entrusted with the protection of these rare resources.

name: Meteorite Mover Mouse
description: Hauling the heaviest pieces of meteorite using his hulking muscles, this mouse is handsomely paid for his hard work.

name: Battering Ram Mouse
description:
Well-dressed and with a wide grin, this cowboy has a gleam of meteorite shining in his eyes and he won't stop until he gets more! Wielding a solid column of meteorite rock, you better catch him before he catches your walls!

When attacking your wall with his battering ram, it produces so much force that it explodes into a cloud of miniscule fragments and dust.

He will cause damage to your fort wall even if caught, so avoid him at all costs!

Rumor has it that this mouse was specially trained in the light of the moon, which gives him his frenzied strength. However, he ironically hates the taste and sight of Crescent and Moon Cheese, recoiling from the imitation moonlight and running off to protect his precious columns of rock!

name: Cursed Taskmaster Mouse
description: Running a tight ship, this taskmaster watches over some of the mining sites keeping everyone in order.  The magic of the meteorite has imbued her with enhanced abilities, and a cool new whip, making her even more "encouraging" when minding the miners! But don't worry, she only uses it to making cracking noises in the air.

name: Dawn Guardian Mouse
description:
Seemingly descending from the cosmos above, this mouse has come to protect what belongs to his home in space: the fallen meteor itself. He is a powerful and mysterious guardian with clear understandings of the secrets locked away inside the meteorite, making sure it doesn't fall into the wrong hands.

His flowing cloak seems to mirror the stars which are the backdrop of his origin. It makes you wonder what else might be up there...

When not caught, this mouse will do damage to your wall equal to the level of rage of the Monster of the Meteor.

name: Mining Materials Manager Mouse
description: This mouse catalogues, collects and manages all materials that move out of the meteor. Nothing gets past her watch! She determines pay rates by evaluating the haul brought back by the miners and sets them on their way. She is likely to have quite a few Meteorite Pieces on hand if you catch her!

name: Night Shift Materials Manager Mouse
description: The work day of a miner never ends! With the night reinvigorating the miners in the area, more work can now be done! The Night Shift Materials Manager Mouse has also expanded into collecting the now irresistible Howlite and will drop some if caught!

name: Hardworking Hauler Mouse
description:
Looking to make the most of the Fort Rox fortune, he leaves no stone unturned. Busting his rump, this overburdened mouse packs his bags chock-full of meteorite before hauling them out.

"Just... one... more!"

name: Mischievous Meteorite Miner Mouse
description:
Mousey see, mousey do!

Seeing everyone else caught up in a craze to obtain the chunks of the meteorite, he quickly joined in! He has no idea what they are for, why people want them or what to do with them, but that doesn't stop him! He just grabs what he can and runs off with them to who knows where!

name: Mischievous Wereminer Mouse
description:
Oh no! Looks like this mouse got in over his head!

Upset and scared by all the crazy changes occurring at night, he is easily frightened and will toss away his meteorite in order to outrun his troubles!

name: Monster of the Meteor
description:
A powerful gigantic beast that has come lumbering out of the center of the meteor which is seemingly the source of chaos stirring up all of the mayhem in Fort Rox. Looking to reclaim the stolen Meteorite Pieces of which he is composed, he is heading directly to the Fort Rox battlements to retrieve them from the very walls where they reside.

This mouse carries with it great treasures and if caught will drop a handful to be used in the creation of powerful traps.

Each time this mouse is caught, he becomes more enraged and your fort wall will take more damage the next time you fail to capture any mouse!

name: Meteorite Golem Mouse
description: A mighty golem assembled of pure meteorite and the magical energy that flows through it. These mighty golems were assembled to defend the fallen meteor from thieves and miners that look to steal it.

name: Meteorite Miner Mouse
description: Hearing word of the meteorite-rich area in the valley, this hard-working mouse has moved his family from the dusty old city to a small settlement to the south in search of new riches and opportunity.

name: Meteorite Mystic Mouse
description:
Drawn to the fallen meteor from afar by the massive magical energies it radiates, this mystical seer has become attuned to the air itself which surrounds the meteorite, channeling its raw power and learning from its ancient secrets.

Lost to the powers of the meteorite, this mouse now serves a higher power than her own.

name: Hypnotized Gunslinger Mouse
description: A young, promising gunslinger hypnotized by the mysterious magics brought about by the meteorite in Fort Rox. Trading in his prowess for precision for a small chunk of meteorite, he now remains entranced by the rock which has taken hold of his mind.

name: Meteorite Snacker Mouse
description: This sneaky snacker has developed quite the taste for meteorite. He hides during the night and pokes around during the day when everything is a lot safer to munch on the leftover meteorite found lying around on the battlefield.

name: Night Watcher Mouse
description:
An old, wise mystic who seems to be immune to the magic emanating from the meteorite. It looks as though he has harnessed the power of meteorite itself and is using it to ward the meteorite's mysterious magics.

Perhaps he has seen this kind of thing before...

name: Nightfire Mouse
description:
Angry, thunderous magics cascade and flow through the fingers of the Nightfire Mouse. This mouse is almost bound to the magic emanating from the fallen space rock, commanding the swirling black dust of meteorite that hovers above its impact zone. In these dense clouds of space dust, he weaves mighty storms of terrible lightning!

This mouse will let nothing come between him and the meteor! With his abilities to command space tempests, he brings greater damage to your fort wall when he is not captured!

name: Nightmancer Mouse
description:
An extremely powerful mage, this mouse uses his powers to commune with the meteorite and control the phases of the night. Performing powerful rituals to bend the darkness to his will, he empowers his fellow Shadow mice by giving them more time to lay siege to your fort.

Failing to catch the Nightmancer Mouse allows him to complete his ritual, pushing back the dawn and extending the night by 3 hunts.

name: Reveling Lycanthrope Mouse
description: One mouse who has fully embraced her lupine side and is relishing her newfound form and abilities. She will do anything to keep the fallen meteor and her new weremouse family safe.

name: Wealthy Werewarrior Mouse
description:
A warrior adorned in meteorite, her fighting prowess has been proven countless times on the battlefield, and she more than deserves the symbols of honor and glory that she wears. Her many victories have been celebrated with great treasures which she carries into battle.

If you can defeat this mouse, some of her rewards can be yours!

name: Alpha Weremouse
description: The biggest, meanest, and strongest weremouse of the night, this buff beast seeks out and hunts down the bigger pieces of meteorite rock and will defend it fiercely.

name: Werehauler Mouse
description:
With a spring in his step and a whistle while he works, the Werehauler Mouse's job becomes considerably easier during the night.

His new lupine form improves his strength and agility lending to his incredible hauling capabilities.

name: Wereminer Mouse
description:
A poor, unfortunate miner that has been cursed to wander the nights as this wolf-like monster.

Thankfully, it seems his goals are unchanged and he looks to be embracing his newfound magical strength to keep on mining!

name: Joy Mouse
description: Bringing joy to Gnawnia, this mouse aids in reveling during the holiday season!  With gold flakes of confetti, he pops up everywhere celebrating when you least expect him!

name: Great Winter Hunt Impostor
description: Dressed as Father Christmas, this impostor became infamous many years ago for going from house to house stealing everyone's gifts, replacing them with coal, and hitting them with "Holiday Cheer" (the name he has given to his bat). Fortunately, the MouseHunters of Gnawnia managed to ground this festive fiend while flying through the Winter Wonderland but he still manages to return every season to spread as much "Holiday Cheer" as he can.

name: Frightened Flying Fireworks Mouse
description:
With a little fear and a lot of guts, this firework-obsessed mouse is determined to see the beautiful fireworks from the best possible seat in the house: Right on the back of one!

Hmm, wonder if he has any regrets...

name: Costumed Rooster Mouse
description:
The Year of the Rooster brings with it another fiery and majestic celebration!

The rooster is hard-working, honest, bright and very ambitious. They are the first to rise in the morning and answer the call of the horn. The early rooster gets the dumpling.

name: Sprinkly Sweet Cupcake Cook Mouse
description:
A sprinkly sweet mouse cooking up her own special brand of cupcakes, slathering them in a storm of sprinkles to snazz them up! Unfortunately, her choice of flavours, such as toothpaste and tree bark, have left them quite undesirable for most of her clientele...

One does wonder where she gets all those sprinkles...

name: Heart of the Meteor
description:
Nestled within the remnants of the Fort Rox meteor slumbers an incredible source of power. This tiny mouse courses with energy, presumed to be what radiates throughout the Fort Rox mice, causing all of the unique transformations.

Seemingly at peace and unaware of her surroundings, she is in a deep and powerful trance, emitting waves of bright, blinding light to supply her followers with their great strength and abilities.

Nothing can break her trance, save for the alluring source of sunlight from Sunrise Cheese...

name: Barmy Gunner Mouse
description: Wild-eyed and along for the ride! She's not much for this whole piracy business, but being able to earn her keep by firing cannons all day is a dream come true for this lover of fire and explosions!

name: Bilged Boatswain Mouse
description: In charge of the equipment and the operating crew of the ship. This bilged and bulging mouse delegates daily work orders and makes sure all ship repairs are done on time. His favourite job is hoisting the anchor, who is also his best friend.

name: Cabin Boy Mouse
description: Hard at work to garner favour with the ship's captain, this peppy "pirate in the making" can be found swabbing his little heart out on the deck of the ship day or night.

name: Corrupt Commodore Mouse
description: A defector from the Royal Mouse Navy, these mice still wear the fancy outfits and come with advanced nautical training but have switched sides in search of glory and treasure. To be their own mouse and to answer to no one is truly the dream!

name: Dashing Buccaneer Mouse
description:
With a slash and a dash, these mice hit hard and fast! Not one to let a pegged leg slow them down, they are the forefront of every pirate attack and are the first aboard enemy ships!

It looks like this one has had a run in with a Travelling Barber Mouse or two...

name: Eggsquisite Entertainer Mouse
description:
Watch and be amazed! Be mystified! The great Eggsquisite Entertainer will eggscite you with his performance focused around and consisting eggsclusively of eggs! Training for an entire lifetime waiting for the Spring Egg Hunt to finally put on the show of your egg-loving life!

"Eggs?! Who said anything about eggs!?"

name: Tomb Exhumer Mouse
description:
Deep below the surface where the royal, the rich, and the famous are left to rot is where the Tomb Exhumer Mouse thrives. Tossing and turning old and forgotten tombs looking for anything of value, she raids quickly to avoid the malevolent spirits that she disturbs.

This is one tomb raider who won't let old riches lay buried for long. Where there is a stench of death and decay, this mouse is sure to be near... But she will only stumble out of the tombs she raids at the scent of Undead String Emmental!

name: Absolute Acolyte Mouse
description: Phenomenal cosmic power bound only by the Bristle Woods Rift, these terrifying mice of immense influence and control over time are a mere whisker away from breaking free from their confinements. Entwined in endless strings of time, altered by previous attempts at escape, it is unknown if the Absolute Acolyte Mouse will be able to eventually break free or perhaps already has, but we must do everything in our power to prevent this from occurring in any timeline!

name: Chronomaster Mouse
description:
In possession of every known tool used to track time, the Chronomaster Mouse has complete control over the ebb and flow of precious time, but only within the Bristle Woods Rift. He has been amassing Time Sand in his special Ancient Hourglass in order to cause a big enough shift to tear the Rift completely open, plunging Gnawnia into chaos.

Capture him to earn his Ancient Hourglass in order to collect Time Sand and enter the Acolyte Chamber!

name: Vigilant Ward Mouse
description: These horrible creatures haunt the chambers of the Bristle Woods Rift. Their faces cast in stone and affixed with burning amber eyes, they are always watching, waiting to strike.

name: Portal Paladin Mouse
description:
Powerful guards trained by the Chronomaster Mouse himself to protect the ever-shifting chambers of the Bristle Woods Rift and prevent the collection of precious Time Sand.

Find the Guard Barracks in order to subdue these mice so that you may more freely travel throughout the portals without their presence.

name: Epoch Golem Mouse
description: These giant time engines slowly walk the Bristle Woods Rift, keeping in perfect time with the occurrence of events. In an instant, they have the ability to go forward or backwards in time to go when and where they are needed.

name: Timeslither Pythoness Mouse
description: Slithering and sneaking through the portals in search of prey, she slips through chambers unseen until she spots her target. Her victim never knows she is coming as she displaces time itself while she moves about. Wooden glasses may have worked on her distant cousin the Gorgon Mouse to prevent paralysis, but with her ability to twist time, there's no escape from her gaze! She will appear before your eyes in an instant and petrify even the bravest of hunters.

name: Record Keeper Mouse
description: With all the time stealing, stopping, losing, finding, rewinding and fast forwarding that happens in the Bristle Woods Rift, someone has to keep track of it all! The Record Keeper Mouse does its best to track every millisecond that elapses or doesn't elapse or exists without... existing...? I can't wrap my head around it but these mice sure can!

name: Record Keeper's Assistant Mouse
description: No master of the art of inscription is complete without their apprentice! These assistants follow the guidance of the Record Keeper mice, carrying spare tomes used for recording events as they unfold in the Bristle Woods Rift, doing everything in their power to protect their mentors.

name: Timeless Lich Mouse
description: Unbound by time, they have freed themselves from their mortal bonds by absconding with the raw essence of life from lesser mice. Using it to fold time onto itself, they have limitlessly increased their lifespan, with it earning timeless wisdom combined with equally matched power.

name: Sentient Slime Mouse
description: This fiery glob of slime has been given life and even its very own tiny skeleton! It is a byproduct of the volatile magics at work within the Bristle Woods Rift. It moves rather swiftly and its oozing outerlayer is hot to the touch. Nothing's quite as terrifying as an upright, combat-ready, thinking, moving slime with its own skeletal structure!

name: Chamber Cleaver Mouse
description:
These mice are true masters of the Bristle Woods Rift and its tricky pathways, able to move freely through chambers without requiring the use of portals. Their unique ability to cleave through the very walls of this magical place and cross the boundaries of time into other chambers make them valuable assets in the service of the Absolute Acolyte Mouse. Unfortunately, this ability has given hunters a bit of an edge as well.

If they are caught before a chamber is cleared of its loot, the portals will open instantly, allowing hunters to step through them into another chamber.

name: Harbinger of Death Mouse
description: Feared are the harbingers for they approach without warning, say nothing, and leave silently as your world fades to black. The first sight of a harbinger will most likely be your last!

name: Portal Plunderer Mouse
description: Popping up in chambers and travelling through portals, these mice snatch up whatever they can before the loot runs out. Afterwards, they just hop into another portal and keep plundering away!

name: Skeletal Champion Mouse
description: Garbed in a ragged, royal purple cloak, these undead automatonic animatronics are of the highest caliber front line soldier, produced en masse for keeping order within the Bristle Woods Rift. They seem to have been dipped in bronze and their harrowing appearance provides an extra edge in combat against the enemy.

name: Timelost Thaumaturge Mouse
description: Out of space and out of time, these time-obsessed magicians no longer know or care when they are. Time manipulation has been their focus and they will take any opportunity to test it out on any poor soul that comes their way.

name: Shackled Servant Mouse
description: When a mouse perishes within the Rift, the powerful forces within it trap their essence and prevent it from passing into the ether. These poor, unfortunate souls lash out at anything nearby, desperately longing for freedom from their bonds.

name: Clockwork Timespinner Mouse
description: As reliable as sands through the hourglass, this ticking spinner of time tocks its way along the intricate paths between portals, building magnificent webs that shiver in step with every passing second. Each timed twang of the tendrils in its web are in rhythm with the turning gears tucked within this monstrous mouse, the vibrations of its web increasing violently as it grows nearer.

name: Portal Pursuer Mouse
description: A vile creature, exhumed from her grave and made to haunt those who defy the Absolute Acolyte and disturb her domain. If this mouse is encountered in the Ingress Chamber, she will pursue her disturber out of the chamber and into any other chamber the unfortunate hunter happens to enter until her bones are put to rest in the Pursuer Mousoleum.

name: Dread Knight Mouse
description: A truly dreadful knight that guards the chambers from unwanted inhabitants. He instills pure fear into the hearts of mice and men alike. His sword and armour are legendary and his mask was said to have come from staring death itself in the face.

name: Carrion Medium Mouse
description: This being is a decayed husk of a mouse, mostly kept alive by dark magics that force the body to continue long after the spirit has moved on. With their souls kept inside the quartz embedded in their staves, defeating their bodies will not stop them, but merely anger them further...

name: Artillery Commander Mouse
description: Tucked away inside the Warmonger's top secret Command Tent, this stout mouse holds on to the Artillery Strike Launch Box which he uses to command an elite strike force of bombers to wipe out targets from a safe distance. Evidence of this weapon can be seen from the burning rubble that remains at Muridae. He sits waiting patiently for the orders to strike!

name: Charming Chimer Mouse
description:
A beautiful song can be heard as the wind from the plateau caresses the intricate chimes that decorate this mouse's attire. Unexpected shifts in the breeze alter their rhythm, alerting these mice far in advance to incoming threats.

One could get lost listening to these beautiful melodies.

name: Cloud Collector Mouse
description: A clever alchemist with specialized skills involving cloudweaving. He captures rogue rain clouds to create murky concoctions of swirling cumulonimbi. These powerful potions are to be unleashed only when needed to wrest control of the weather from the windy mice.

name: Cycloness Mouse
description: A powerful worshiper of the wind with the ability to create gusts and influence the air as she sees fit. She uses this power to create cyclones which exercise dominance over the weather on the plateau.

name: Dragoon Mouse
description: Big, bad and quite the brute, this dragon has dedicated his life to honing his physical prowess. He acts as the gatekeeper, stopping non-dragonkin from reaching the apex of the stormy Moussu Picchu mountain plateau.

name: Fluttering Flutist Mouse
description: Floating on air as she makes beautiful music to coincide with the windy weather, this mouse plays her musical medley in time with the wind. From fierce crescendos to light and whimsical melodies, the tide of the weather can be heard when flutists flock together.

name: Ful'Mina the Mountain Queen
description:
Resting high above Moussu Picchu among the clouds, Ful'Mina is the true queen of the mountain and ruler over the skies and storms. As the Moussu Picchu Inhabitants below battle endlessly for dominance of the weather, the resulting stalemate allows the queen to slumber for generations.

Once, long ago, she would appear high above the land anywhere a lightning cloud hovered, visiting the many realms of mice across Gnawnia, her tail smacking the ground like lightning as she plucked treasures with it to add to her hoard. Now, countless decades pass in between sightings of the Mountain Queen, so much so that her very existence has gone from folklore, to legend, to mere myth...

But now, MouseHunters from the Kingdom of Gnawnia have found their way through the mountain pass, and their presence has brought a shift to the power struggle in these ruins, as they always do. Hunters have begun to harness the powers of both the Wind Wanderer and Rain Roamer tribes of mice in the area, ironically bringing unity between the two after endless centuries of feuding.

As the winds grow stronger, the rains fall heavier, and the storms begin to mix and clash, great bone-shaking growls can be heard from above the thickest of clouds, where the queen is said to reside. Is this thunder? Or is it the great Mountain Queen being rudely awakened from her slumber? Slowly but surely, disturbed by the intensifying battle in the lands below and the low rumble of impending thunderstorms in the clouds upon which she rests, she begins to rouse from her deep sleep...

Soon, and without warning, Ful'Mina the Mountain Queen, will descend upon the lands with great fury to bring order to the chaos through the destructive force of her indomitable lightning storms.

name: Homeopathic Apothecary Mouse
description:
This tireless alchemist is constantly brewing strange concoctions and inventing new experimental formulas. Among his scattered notes are recipes for topical creams, energy drinks, cheese flavour enhancers and a very fine ginseng tea. A few of the more recent pages imply that he managed to synthesize something that defies the laws of thermodynamics, but it... escaped.

His preceding notes all seem to be focused on finding a method to build the impossible collection of the preserved essence of every living thing on the planet, and early drafts of a really big vessel to carry them all.

name: Monsoon Maker Mouse
description: He sails above the clouds on a rain-flavoured nimbus, waving a storm gem-infused ladle that generates rainwater. With this incredible artifact, he is a self-powered rainstorm contained in one cloud

name: Nightshade Flower Girl Mouse
description: The frequent rain showers from the storms on the plateau make Nightshade bloom like wildflowers. This attracts flower girls who enjoy the lovely colours and rich aromas that come from these plants.

name: Nightshade Maiden Mouse
description: While others eventually outgrow the task of picking wild Nightshade, these maidens dedicate themselves to the acquisition of these wondrous flowers for their entire lives! With their advanced knowledge of nightshade, they know that it glows the brightest when exposed to Cavern Fungus, inspiring them to collect a few of those as well.

name: Rain Collector Mouse
description:
These scholarly students of rain history wait patiently for the storms to start before leaving cover, parading around out in the inclement weather with their special equipment, collecting as much rainwater as possible for closer scrutiny. These mice collect and date rainwater from as far back as they can remember, passing their collections down from generation to generation.

"This rainwater here is from the flash flood of the great downpour of '78! Oh, and this beaker here contains water from a storm on the same day the year later!"

name: Rainwater Purifier Mouse
description: This mouse imbues the fallen rainwater with magical properties, helping empower the Rain Roamer mice as well as accelerate the growth of the flora and fauna upon the Moussu Picchu plateau.

name: Rain Wallower Mouse
description: Sad when it rains, but even sadder when it doesn't, this mouse loves to wallow. His staff acts as a divining rod for tiny rainstorms, allowing him to find sorrow wherever he goes. He will sit outside for hours and hours in the rain, waiting for the storm to finish, and then move on to find another one to wallow in.

name: Rainmancer Mouse
description:
A powerful magus who can call upon the storm at will, the Rainmancer Mouse resides at the heart of only the most severe of storms, fuelling their awesome power and longevity.

Using storm spheres, he can conjure up neighbouring storm clouds and force them to combine into one massive supercell!

name: Spore Salesman Mouse
description:
The heat and humidity coupled with an almost limitless supply of rain cause the fungus in this area to grow quite rapidly. This little guy does his best to make a living off of the fungus surplus from the mouldy outcroppings that litter the plateau.

"May I interest you in some freshly grown Cavern Fungus? Makes a great light when they glow at night! Got no cheese? Munch on one of these! Cavern Fungus! The food of the future!"

name: Rain Summoner Mouse
description: Consultant of the rain stones, this mouse channels her affinity for rain through these stones to attract rainstorms.

name: Thundering Watcher Mouse
description: Awaits patiently high above the cloudline for the weather conditions to converge into the perfect thunderstorm. Once the rain and the wind become a powerful maelstrom of thunder and lightning, he alerts the other Storm Dragon mice to take to the skies, bringing calm and order back to Moussu Picchu.

name: ⚡Thunderlord⚡
description:
Able to tap into the raw natural energies present during storms, these powerful dragons descend onto the plateau from the skies above to restore order to Moussu Picchu and eliminate those that are upsetting the balance of power.

"I am the Thunderlord! Lord of THUNDER... and THUNDER OF LORDS!!!"

name: Thunder Strike
description:
Thunder... Thunder...

This powerful dragonling courses with tremendous lightning energy, thriving in the very chaos of massive rainstorms. His entire body is a lightning rod which channels the power of the storm straight into his lightning gauntlets, the left of which uses alternating current (AC) and the right of which uses direct current (DC).

"You've been... Thunder Striked!"

name: Violet Stormchild
description: A descendant of the powerful dragon lords, Violet Stormchild has the incredible ability to weave nearby lightning to do her bidding. She revels in the heart of thunderous monsoons, dancing and swaying fearsomely in the midst of the utter chaos.

name: Breeze Borrower Mouse
description: A gentle heart resides in this soft-spoken mouse. She has the rare, innate ability to pluck raw essences straight from the soft breeze itself. She collects this for the more powerful Wind Wanderer mice that have the ability to harness this essence into something more powerful.

name: Windy Farmer Mouse
description: Prances around and plucks up all of the wind-infused greenery to extract wind essence, creating valuable Windy Potions.

name: Wind Warrior Mouse
description:
One with the wind, this masterful warrior almost floats as he effortlessly slices and dices through the air. These powerful mice fight on behalf of the wind to claim control of the Moussu Picchu plateau.

"Float like a butterfly, sting like a Storm Dragon!"

name: Wind Watcher Mouse
description: Earnest and ever on the lookout for the change in wind, he plots out the current weather tendencies and does his best to predict the change in the weather to keep his fellow wind watchers apprised of any impending storms. His massive beard acts as a windsock, helping him to track the eddies as they flow across the ruins.

name: Captain Cannonball
description:
Long since passed the mortal plane of mousey existence, this mouse and his ghoulish companions have been missing their old stomping grounds and have an undying desire to come back for a visit.

Adorned in captain's apparel recovered from the bottom of the sea, this zombie ghostship captain has gathered a fleet of once sunken cruise ships to send over to the realm of the living. He takes with him the yearning souls on cursed cruises throughout the regions of Gnawnia.

Where the ghostships came from is anyone's guess...

name: Ghost Pirate Queen Mouse
description:
Pirate Queen of the Rift! Swashing and buckling her way through the toughest of strongholds, she steals from everyone and is strong enough to cleave her way through into other Rifts.

When Halloween approaches, the weakening of the fabric between the Rift Plane and stable lands of Gnawnia tears just enough to allow her to cutlass through and secure passage on the ghostships, pillaging a whole new world of victims!

name: Scorned Pirate Mouse
description: Joining the ranks of the ghostship legion, this once lovely maiden was scorned in her past life. Taken too early from her former lover, she travels the skies in search not only to reunite with her living loved one but also to exact revenge upon the ones who crossed them...

name: Spectral Swashbuckler Mouse
description: A once noble swashbuckler from ships long past lost. Too many damsels never saved from distress, too many downtrodden left undefended, this mouse has now earned passage aboard the ghostships under the guise of a pirate to be given the chance to once again return to the living and help those in need. But being an undead minion has a way of twisting your intentions...

name: Craggy Ore Mouse
description: A small ore-like mouse that hides in plain sight upon the Mountain path. This mouse curls up near ore deposits and waits for stronger mice to pummel their way through before lightly snacking on the leftover piles of crumbled rock.

name: Mountain Mouse
description: A mountain explorer who has learned to live off the land near the top of the Mountain. Burly, strong and well-adjusted to the harsh weather conditions, he is very territorial and is known to throw a trap or two off the summit.

name: Slope Swimmer Mouse
description: With webbed feet and rock-shredding spines, this mouse frolics all up and down the mountainous slope with the greatest of ease. This mouse can be seen tunnelling into the Mountain for a treat or two when he gets hungry.

name: Snow Golem Jockey Mouse
description: This clever mouse has figured out how to craft his own tiny Snow Golems as a means of quick and comfortable transportation. The additional speed and height provided by riding these miniature golems makes him a formidable opponent in any snowball fight!

name: Nice Knitting Mouse
description: This Winter Hunt loving mouse just loves Snow Golems of all shapes and sizes, going out of its way to make sure every snow creation is fully dressed for the occasion.

name: Snow Golem Architect Mouse
description:
The mice have all been stealing Snow Golem parts knowing that they possess some value, but with no idea how to use them. That's where the Snow Golem Architect Mouse comes in!

Feverishly at work on finishing blueprints of his own design, he hopes to one day be able to build a Snow Golem to fight for the mice... hopefully before the event ends!

name: Naughty Nougat Mouse
description: This naughty mouse is here to consume all the warm fuzzies this holiday season! During the 2017 festivities, this Winter Hunt hating mouse had found his way to the magical core of the Festive Comet and tried to infect it with his loathing of the season.

name: Costumed Dog Mouse
description:
The Year of the Dog brings forth an air of seriousness, discipline and growth! A celebration of hard work and determination will lead to a year of bountiful rewards!

The dog is loyal, devoted and just, but also appreciates laziness as a virtue. Inspiring confidence, the dog will lead you on new and incredible journeys!

name: Lunar Red Candle Maker Mouse
description:
This artist, inspired by the Lunar New Year Celebrations, has dedicated her time to capturing the raw essence of these joyous festivities and focusing them into these beautiful, celebratory Red Lunar Lantern Candles.

All the good luck and good fortune she can find is meticulously crafted into these beautiful works of art!

name: Reality Restitch Mouse
description: A celestial mouse who weaves a record of the passage of time. Indiscriminate of events or materials, she sews together and makes sense of the chaos of current events upon the fabric of time as she receives it.

name: Time Punk Mouse
description:
Looking to get some "sweet duds" custom made for his mousepunk revolt, this mouse was offered a brand new set of free, custom tailored clothes if he agreed to just help alter the course of time.

He carries with him one half of a rather oversized pair of scissors which helps him shear his way through time, disrupting the flow of events throughout Gnawnia's history.

With a smug, all-too-cool look on his face, this punk is on a quest to wreak some spacetime havoc in the future, past, and present!

name: Time Tailor Mouse
description: With a timeless fashion sense, this mouse makes time look good on him!  Able to weave with the fabric of time itself, this mouse is hard at work re-weaving MouseHunters out of history and adding a little bit of flair and pizazz to his own.

name: Time Thief Mouse
description:
It all started with a passion for fashion. Pouring over decades of designs and patterns, this inquisitive mouse began his illustrious career in the world of cloth and thread as a humble tailor, weaving beautiful garments for the mousey elite, inspired by history's influence over fashion.

The more he explored the history of fashion, the more he learned its secrets. His first real commission as a professional tailor was to knit a magical scarf for Zugzwang himself. Realizing his talents, he slowly began to grasp the ability to weave the fabric of time itself, which was no simple feat.

Key moments in history where fashion had an effect on crucial events began to reveal themselves....

The Time Thief Mouse realized that these pivotal points in time would be critical in shifting the balance of power away from hunters and more toward mice, perhaps thinking he could help to relieve their supposed plight. He had no choice but to tear the very fabric of time and step into MouseHunt's past to re-write history...

If this mouse succeeds, history as we know it will change and our way of living will cease to exist!

name: Spring Sprig Mouse
description: A lovely little mouse holding a spring sprig of a flower that only blooms during the Spring Egg Hunt! She is almost too cute to catch!

name: Chip Chiseler Mouse
description: Down in the quarry, these miniature miners chip at the lustrous Nachore to trade it for some delicious queso with the River Riders.

name: Croquet Crusher Mouse
description:
A highly competitive saboteur whose matches always end with a bang! The pipes coming from the pumps in Queso River are perfect for use as hoops in their explosive version of croquet.

The big difference here is they aren't trying to clear the hoops but instead destroy them!

name: Fiery Crusher Mouse
description: A flaming monolith that crushes his foes and food deep down inside the quarry before consuming them both in a fiery rage!

name: Grampa Golem Mouse
description:
This mouse has been down in the quarry a loooong time. Retired with his savings of Nachore, not much gets him out and about anymore unless its some hot, spicy cheese!

"ROCK IN YO FACE!"

name: Nachore Golem Mouse
description: A golem made out of pure Nachore! Their magmatic stomach bile melts the Nachore down into a more refined, molten liquid that circulates throughout their body. They excrete the byproduct of the digested Nachore through their pores which forms their Nachore-like exterior.

name: Nachous the Molten
description:
The unchallenged lord of the Nachore underworld that exists deep below Cantera Quarry, Nachous is powerful and pulsing with molten blood, able to mould his body into whatever form is necessary. He is fabled to possess the legendary Ember Stone, giving him great power and control over heat and the earth itself.

Never seen or heard but his name is whispered on the lips of those who dare to dig too deep. Satisfied by only the hottest Nachore closest to the core of Gnawnia, it would take something extremely hot to grab this great one's attention...

This mouse is only interested in Flamin' Queso. No other cheese will do!

name: Ore Chipper Mouse
description: These little guys are the clean up crew of the Cantera Quarry. They are one of the smaller mice that scavenge the quarry, looking for any spare "chips" of Nachore left behind by the bigger mice.

name: Pump Raider Mouse
description: A tiny marvel of machinery, this mouse scavenges for extra Nachore and spare parts to put together fantastical machines of pump destruction. Too tiny to destroy anything but big enough to disrupt operations!

name: Queso Extractor Mouse
description: The one-mouse cutting, drilling and pumping machine! Using his crafty ingenuity to create a mobile pumping station, he has embarked out on his own to stake his claim to the Queso Canyon queso rush!

name: Queen Quesada
description:
Keeper of Queso, Ruler of Ember Root, Sovereign of Ember Stone. Queen Quesada is the true master of the secret energies sealed within the naturally occurring resources found in Queso Canyon. This powerful deity is a force to be reckoned with!

Only those hunters brave enough to fully explore all the areas within Queso Canyon may earn what is required to gain audience with the queen and hold counsel in her court of queso.

This mouse is only interested in something even hotter than Flamin' Queso...

name: Rubble Rouser Mouse
description: A big, muscul-ore mouse that likes to play with his Nachore before he eats it!

name: Rubble Rummager Mouse
description: A thorough scavenger of the quarry, the Rubble Rummager sustains itself off of the dropped and discarded Nachore without having to expend energy to mine it themselves.

name: Sleepy Merchant Mouse
description:
Constantly peckish, this mouse munches on his own products to the point of going in and out of a queso coma. This hard-working queso vendor has trouble keeping an eye on his supplies... Or maybe has TOO much of an eye on them!

SUPER|Brie+ is the only thing that can wake this entrepreneur and I'm pretty sure it would be easy to snatch some supplies after he falls asleep again.

name: Old Spice Collector Mouse
description:
One of the oldest in the trade of spice collecting. After his long years collecting various spices, he has chosen to settle down and mellow out, now spending his time enjoying the milder side of spice. No longer a youthful man, he has no time for the spicier leaves of the plains.

He loves to weave tales, teaching and regaling those new "up-and-comers" in the spice trade, telling stories of his spicy adventures!

name: Spice Farmer
description: A dedicated, well-seasoned spice farmer specializing in Medium Spice Leaves. Busy bailing away the day and collecting the recent spice field yields.

name: Spice Finder Mouse
description: Extremely thick skin coupled with a lower-than-average body temperature, these mice are drawn to the warmth of the hottest spices within the Prickly Plains.

name: Granny Spice Mouse
description:
Gentle and caring, this friendly mouse tends to and helps in the growth of Medium Spice Leaf plants. Treating each plant as her own, her tender love and care accelerates their growth and potency.

Though kind, she won't tolerate any misbehaving around her garden that might threaten the growth of her crops! She'll do what it takes to protect her plants.

"Come and sit with me for a bit, dear... SPICE IN YO FACE!"

name: Spice Raider Mouse
description: Armed with a torch and a tough exterior, this burly spice mouse raids the plains at night, under the cover of darkness. Hot spice is easily visible under low light conditions due to its ember-like glow, and with his imposing stature, makes it easy for him to collect without much trouble.

name: Spice Reaper Mouse
description:
Drawing upon the intense energies held within the spice, these fighters infuse themselves with finely ground Flamin' Spice Leaf and defend it with the same flaming energy.

Quite an interesting natural defence mechanism!

name: Spice Seer Mouse
description: The Spice Seer can look into the future of the fertile grounds around the Prickly Plains, determining the best locations for the biggest yields of future spiced crops.

name: Inferna the Engulfed
description:
Ruler of the powers locked within the spicy leaves, Inferna wields her spice staff adorned with Flaming Spice Leaves, allowing her to command the spice itself! Guardian of the long lost Ember Root, the powerful remains of a plant that once protected these fields from intruders.

With a wave of the staff, the Sorcerer can set the spice ablaze and turn the fields into an inescapable inferno. Make sure you don't miss!

This mouse is only interested in Flamin' Queso. No other cheese will do!

name: Spice Sovereign Mouse
description: The governing royals of the Prickly Plains, these mice are specially trained for spice appraisal and analysis of hot spice leaves for quality and purity. Anything spicier would be uncivilized!

name: Tiny Saboteur Mouse
description:
This little mouse is on the prowl for pumps! With the rise in the number of individuals interested in pumping queso from the river, this mouse has found it easier to get queso directly from the pumps themselves.

Self-taught with a screwdriver, this guy can strip a pump and reassemble it in less than three shakes of a White Mouse's tail!

name: Tiny Toppler Mouse
description: Before they grow up big and strong, these tiny little guys have to work twice as hard to topple stalagmites for small residuals of Nachore that the bigger mice don't even look twice at.

name: Clumsy Chemist Mouse
description: A quite clever chemist bogged down by a constant curiosity for how everything and anything works! Just walking down the corridors takes him a good couple hours, and that includes corridors he has already traversed hundreds of times. These constant distractions delay his work dramatically and can cause quite a few setbacks...

name: Coffin Zombie Mouse
description:
When a caretaker finds a corpse lying about, they think it was just an unfortunate soul that was forgotten and not given a proper burial. Not wanting to be blamed for being the one that forgot to bury a body, they are quickly packaged up into a spare coffin and buried, but not before also being wrapped in chains, JUST in case it might actually be a sleeping zombie. You can never be too safe...

Most of the time it's a corpse, but sometimes... AH, A ZOMBIE!!

name: Admiral Arrrgh
description: With the failure of Captain Cannonball's invasion attempt last year on his mind, this well decorated admiral of the ghostship invasion fleet has stepped out of the shadows. Commanding the attack from the safety of the skies, he is sure to keep a close eye on the battle as it unfolds... He won't make the same mistake as the previous mouse in command!

name: Mutated Mole Mouse
description: The once quiet and calm mole mice from Digby have become these gigantic and lumbering beasts. Following an old tunnel left behind by the escaping scientists, these mice dug right through the radioactive soil beneath the Laboratory, causing gargantuan mutations to occur. The major benefit of their new huge size allow them to travel quickly underground.

name: Sludge Scientist Mouse
description: Fascinated with the byproduct known as Radioactive Sludge, this scientist has devoted his talented mind into finding a way to reconstitute it into a more useful medium.

name: Squeaker Bot Mouse
description:
The mice who took over the Laboratory decided to use spare parts scattered around the science workshops to create their own security system. Using cobbled together parts from early prototypes, particle infusers, scraps of metal and probably some wood glue, they managed to create a small army of these little annoying creations.

Unable to eat cheese, they have been programmed to recover it for consumption by their biological overlords.

name: Glazy Mouse
description:
Now here's a guy who knows how to enjoy the holidays! Smothered in a generous coating of Pecorino Glaze, he spends the festive season sipping on syrup and basking in the cold, winter sun. The sticky blanket of glaze not only insulates him from heat loss but also gives his fur a smooth and silky shine.

The only thing that can disturb this cool dude from being glued to his cozy fortress of solitude is more Pecorino Glaze. He just can't seem to slather on enough!

name: Iceberg Sculptor Mouse
description:
A relatively unknown Ice Sculptor who tried to make a big name for himself during the 2018 Great Winter Hunt when the Festive Comet landed in the open ocean. Its magic had seeped out into the surrounding waters, freezing them and creating a special festive iceberg.

With the use of the Festive Comet's magic, he was able to bring his sculptures to life and sent them crashing into the Gnawnian shore.

His goal to make a name for himself was never realized, but he still sculpts with evil hoping his talent will one day be recognized.

name: Costumed Pig Mouse
description:
The kind and thoughtful earth pig will go that extra mile to please everyone around them. They are kind, hardworking, sensible and realistic. They are quick to forgive and will do everything in their power to resolve conflict and injustices.

The Year of the Pig brings many social activities, parties, and a hardworking and fruitful year!

name: Cheesy Party Mouse
description:
No party? No supplies? No problem! This mouse adheres to strict B.Y.O.C. rules and is always ready to party! Prepared to throw the greatest celebration at the drop of a party hat, this mouse blows the roof off of any event!

B.Y.O.C.: Bring Your Own Cheese!

The Cheesy Party Mouse brings his own cheese, so he is only attracted to SUPER|brie+, the one cheese he cannot find on his own!

name: Factory Technician Mouse
description:
A mechanically-inclined individual that is just as enthralled by machines as she is by cheese. She favours the factory as her home as there is usually something to fix and the reward is freshly squeezed cheese!

The Factory Technician Mouse has a chance to appear only when the Factory Repair Charm is armed and will drop extra factory room parts when caught.

name: Vincent the Magnificent
description:
The grand and eccentric Vincent the Magnificent, has invited himself to the birthday celebration taking place in the SUPER|brie+ Factory. He thinks himself to be the owner and operator, running tours for mice so that they may wreak havoc on the factory machinery.

His dastardly actions have left the factory in a dire state of disrepair, but was that his goal all along, or has he bought into his own act as the owner of this grand factory, just doing his job?

Don't be fooled! His true goal is to rob the King blind and leave hunters without necessary cheese supplies!

Hunt with Brie, and you'll be, in a world... of pure mouse domination!

name: Fuzzy Drake Mouse
description: These fuzzy drakes love the soft, well-insulated and waterproof nature of cork. They hoard as much as they can to make suitable nests for living around the canyon.

name: Rambunctious Rain Rumbler Mouse
description: A burly and rambunctious creature that rolls around in the fresh mud during the rainy season when eruptions are less likely to happen. While frollicking, mud and cork tree seeds get caught in deep crevices on its back. When the rainy season ends, they sleep in caves and under large outcroppings to avoid the heat, which allow a beautiful cork tree to sprout on their back.

name: Horned Cork Hoarder Mouse
description: This mouse uses its horns combined with wriggling its powerful neck and spines to chip cork from the local flora, strapping it to himself for armour and protection. The cork provides exquisite thermal protection.

name: Burly Bruiser Mouse
description: Quite muscular and intimidating, these mice often steal Cork Bark from weaker mice to add to their own supply.

name: Cork Defender Mouse
description: This mouse belongs to a small sect of warriors that worship the geyser itself by hoarding cork so that it may erupt freely, without outside interference, as nature intended.

name: Corky the Collector Mouse
description: A noble crusader that liberates cork from the other mice to build up his cork collection which he uses for everything from his home to his equipment. He is even bold enough to steal cork from the other bigger dragons!

name: Corkataur Mouse
description: A monster of a mouse, this horned beast blooms large, protective plumes of cork along its back. This mouse will fan out the cork to attract mates and also to increase their size to intimidate others.

name: Stormsurge the Vile Tempest
description:
A violent dragon with rows of rippling thorny-like capacitors that cover its back. The locomotion created by this being's dynamic movements creates massive amounts of electrostatic charge that can be released with the simple flap of its wings or discharged into an incredible electroflambic ball of fury from its wickedly powerful jaws.

Be careful of what you may mistake as a simple storm cloud...

name: Bruticus the Blazing
description: A brutish mouse whose physical prowess protects him from the lures of most every cheese, save for one: Flamin' Queso Cheese. Constant training and combat has left his wings tattered and frayed, however, his extreme upper body strength more than makes up for the loss of aerodynamics.

name: Ignatia Mouse
description:
Breathes fire from her nostrils to exert dominance in the sky during hot eruptions. Keeps a warm belly full of Hot Queso to last between the eruptions. You don't want to get between her and her queso!

"GOTTA have my queso!"

name: Cinderstorm Mouse
description: A chaotic mouse that erupts into the air with magmatic pressure. His fiery wings cut through the flying molten queso, frying it to a crisp, raining down a beautiful shower of cinders as he soars the queso-clouded skies.

name: Bearded Elder Mouse
description: A wise elder who soars to great heights in preparation of the inevitable eruption. With this strategy, the queso has cooled down enough to enjoy while other mice below have to withstand the unbearable heat.

name: Smoldersnap Mouse
description: Launches into the sky with a crackle and pop. This mouse is quick and agile, poised on its strong hind legs, watching, waiting... The Smouldersnap Mouse only snaps into action when it can catch the scent of Medium Queso Cheese in the air during an eruption.

name: Mild Spicekin Mouse
description:
This dragon is from a lineage that has consumed so many Mild Spice leaves that they have started to evolve and adapt to them: green scales, leafy wings, and all!

You are what you eat, so this mouse is known to have a very mild temperament.

name: Sizzle Pup Mouse
description: A feisty youngling that gets excited from geyser eruptions! Due to its lack of size, he shies away from the bigger eruptions because they are too loud and scary!

name: Kalor'ignis of the Geyser
description: Lore states that this Draconic mouse exudes immeasurable heat and the sheer movement of this creature is so fast that the sky itself is set ablaze. It is believed that based on the estimated amount of Wildfire Queso this mouse consumes, its concentrated oils seep out of its pores and acts as a catalyst when combined with the immense friction caused by its flight, leaving a terribly fiery wake in its path.

name: Pyrehyde Mouse
description: Exuding extreme heat from its upper body, the Pyrehyde Mouse acts as a constant heating element that raises geyser pressures almost involuntarily. The natural occurence of these mice help with keeping up a natural eruption cycle.

name: Vaporior Mouse
description: Convecting the heat from Hot Queso straight into the air around it, this mouse heats the ground below it, acting as a thermal conductor to increase the pressure of the geyser.

name: Warming Wyvern Mouse
description: A cute little wyvern that finds a cool place to curl up and relax. While relaxing, these mice slowly heat up the area around them. Once they return to their elevated heat level, they wake up and waddle over to the next cool spot. Their wings being much too small to fly are mostly for show and act as small thermal blankets as they cover themselves while they slumber.

name: Steam Sailor Mouse
description: This mouse drifts in tight formations within steam built up from the rising pressure of the active geyser. This lowers the pressure in that specific area, causing high surges of queso vapour to intensify and slowly build additional pressure.

name: Emberstone Scaled Mouse
description: This mouse heats up its huge, stonelike scales to vaporize pools of queso around the geyser, generating immense pressure.

name: One-Mouse Band
description:
Armed with clanging rings, a beautifully-handcrafted mandolin, an infernal banging drum and, his best instrument, a shrill voice. It is reported that while on quiet patrol, they produce beautiful music the likes of which is rarely heard by the ears of hunters. Once an intruder has been spotted, this One-Mouse Band gives chase, making horribly loud screeching, banging, and clanging noises, along with the random discordant sound of claws being raked randomly over mandolin strings.

If the One-Mouse Band doesn't scare you away with its racket, the stronger mice alerted by his klaxon just might!

name: Champion Danseuse Mouse
description: Charisma, uniqueness, talent, and elegance. These dancers hail from distant lands to perform on the greatest stage the Rift has ever known. Their mesmerizing dance entraps even the strongest-willed of minds, captivating most who climb the tower to challenge the Eclipse, enchanting them to the point of abandoning their quest.

name: Withered Remains Mouse
description: The drained and withered remains of those that fail in their quest to conquer the Rift Gauntlet. Victims of the Arch Necromancer Mouse, these ghouls are brought back to guard them.

name: Arch Champion Necromancer Mouse
description:
Collector of souls, dominator of the demonic and torturer of trespassers! The all-powerful Arch Necromancer Mouse pulls at the power of those who have fallen on the floors below. With seven stories of souls to siphon, he turns their anger, fears and experiences onto the brave who travel far enough.

From the few who ascend to his floor, even fewer make it through the horrible visions willingly.

name: Shade of the Eclipse Mouse
description:
With the power to eclipse any source of light, this mouse is capable of bending even reality itself to its every whim. To pull itself away from the influence of the King, it has created its own sanctuary deep within an infinite tower. Here, tucked safely away from the King's scouts, it weaves a dark ritual...

Those strong enough to scale the tower will eventually meet one of the many shades of the Eclipse. It leaves one behind everytime it separates its reality into a new one, ducking behind the veil yet again.

Capturing a Shade will temporarily stabilize the Rift, syncing the timelines, allowing hunters to keep their tenuous grip on their position in the tower for just... a little... longer...

name: Timid Explorer Mouse
description: Endlessly wandering the grounds outside of the Valour Rift, the Timid Explorer Mouse has yet to actually enter the tower. She is constantly checking her list of equipment, going over supplies, and making any number of excuses to avoid venturing into the tower to explore. Conveniently, she always forgets something right before she opens the door!

name: Elixir Maker Mouse
description: Absorbing magic and energy from outside the Rift Gauntlet Tower, this mouse bottles the extracted essence into an elixir for trade among the local merchants and those brave enough to traverse the tower.

name: The Total Eclipse
description:
With the seemingly infinite dimensions being created and collapsed, each one with its own remnant of the Eclipse, it is presumed that this is to be the most powerful, tangible form of this elusive entity. The Total Eclipse is at the same time distinct from and identical to all other iterations of itself.

This being can tap into the raw energy of the Rift Plane itself, twisting reality to its will.

Capturing it prunes but one of the infinite branches of this nightmarish reality...

name: Unwavering Adventurer Mouse
description: Determined and full of heart, this lone adventurer has come to challenge the Rift Gauntlet Tower. Brave but not fearless, he pushes forward through the floors looking for something... Hopefully he finds it!

name: Lumi-lancer Mouse
description: A combatant who has repeatedly proven their skills with the lance, spear, and projectile weaponry, this mouse has been bestowed high-tech armour which allows them to conjure weapons made from light on command.

name: Berzerker Mouse
description: Descended from a long line of warriors who live for war, they are emboldened by the fear of others and are known for fits of rage!

name: Mouse of Elements
description: The fusion of each element amalgamated into a single mouse. The creation of these requires the gathering of a group of champions, each focusing their power into one specific element then simultaneously releasing their energy at a focused point. The mice created by this are an uncontrollable rage of elements, each trying to overpower the other as they explode with raw power.

name: Magic Champion Mouse
description: A master of the magical arts. Only those who have passed the Test of Mystics and have survived the Grand Trials of the Magi are awarded the title of Magic Champion. They utilize their honed magics to halt those who dare to challenge the higher floors of the Rift Gauntlet Tower.

name: Martial Mouse
description: A soldier proficient in the martial arts with mastery over many weapons used in direct hand-to-hand combat. Those that rise through the ranks, master the art of war, and claim victory over a vast number of interlopers are promoted to the rank of Praetorian!

name: Praetorian Champion Mouse
description: An elite guard stationed on the third floor of the Rift Gauntlet Tower, these mice are hardened warriors hand-picked from the rest to prevent interlopers from advancing up the tower.

name: Bulwark of Ascent Mouse
description:
An unstoppable force poured into an immovable set of armour. This mouse acts as a wall to stop adventures from progressing any further up the infinite floors of the Rift Gauntlet Tower. With one mighty blow of his shield, this mouse will send you tumbling 10 steps back down the tower.

When you come to this mouse and you can't go through it and you can't knock it down, you know what you found...

The Bulwark! (WHAT?) The Bulwark! The Bulwark!

name: Cursed Crusader Mouse
description:
Leader of a special group of royals sent on a crusade to discover the secrets locked within the seemingly infinite floors of the Rift Gauntlet Tower.

Easily overpowered by the Eclipse itself, these mice and all that follow are enslaved to the Noble Floor to defend against those that dare to challenge the Eclipse.

name: Fallen Champion Footman Mouse
description:
Broken is the shell of the mouse this once was. A trained fighter with a will of steel sent to fell the Eclipse has himself fallen to its immense power. Once they suffer defeat, powerful medallions are placed around their necks to drain whatever willpower they have left.

No longer able to act for themselves, they now fight their comrades in arms and anyone else foolish enough to challenge the Rift Gauntlet and the one that resides at the top.

They do their best to claim their freedom once again as their own, but even stronger is the will of the Total Eclipse...

name: Soldier of the Shade Mouse
description: The highest ranking guards of the Eclipse, these mice are outfitted with exceptional weaponry, armour and equipment created by the Total Eclipse itself. These warriors have crystals that lend them power directly from the Eclipse Core when activated, making them one of the most powerful foes hunters will ever encounter in the entire Rift Plane.

name: Possessed Armaments Mouse
description:
A shiny, form-fitting suit of armour with a matching claymore, both faceted with identical gemstones. Any mouse unlucky enough to gaze upon these wretched armaments are compelled to don the suit and pick up the sword. Those that do surrender control to the armaments are eternally bound by creeping vines.

Using the mouse as a vessel, the mysterious platemail continues on its mission until it requires the company of a new mouse...

name: Prestigious Adventurer Mouse
description: A mighty adventurer who has climbed his share of the Rift Gauntlet Tower. Draped in regal armours and armed with fantastical magic and weapons, he knows his way around the seemingly endless tower.

name: Puppetto Mouse
description:
Built with exquisite artisanship, this puppet has just been activated and has begun to explore the world in which it was introduced. Constructed in likeness to its creator, these mice wander and learn at an accelerated rate thanks to the magic from the Rift Gauntlet Tower that lives within its parts.

They quickly learn who is supposed to be there and who is not welcome...

name: Puppet Champion Mouse
description: A faceless mouse that commands the army of puppets that reside within the Rift Gauntlet Tower. He sees not only through his own eyes but also from the eyes of any puppet under his command. His many masks are controlled the same way, providing constant 360 degree vision. An impressive sentry to guard the first floor from intruders.

name: Terrified Adventurer Mouse
description: Terrified of heights, this battle-hardened adventurer is determined to conquer his fear by climbing the tower to the top! It doesn't help that the design of the tower is an endless upwards spiral. Looking up is just as terrifying as looking down!

name: Cutpurse Mouse
description:
Cunning, resourceful and fleet of foot, these little criminals swindle, scrounge, and plunder through the neighbouring floors, picking pockets from hunter and mice alike.

Don't be too frightened by their magical rune daggers: They are used for cutting purses only!

name: Champion Thief Mouse
description: Skulking the Thief Floor of the Rift Gauntlet Tower to seek out heedless adventurers to pilfer. You'll need to watch your front, back, and all sides when crossing daggers with a Champion Thief!

name: Shorts-All-Year Mouse
description:
This old, retired, grumpy gus of an engineer used to travel to warmer climes every winter to escape the cold. As soon as he felt the first chilly breeze of the season, he would hop on a westerly wagon to the Sandtail Desert. Until one year, just as he was about to set off for the season, the Festive Comet came crashing down and landed right on top of his wagon, smashing it to pieces, and leaving him stranded!

This mouse had meticulously planned his retirement around being just the right amount of warm all year; never too hot, and never, ever too cold. So much thought had gone into this lifestyle decision that he had changed his whole wardrobe to revolve around only wearing his favourite summer apparel: Shorts!

Stubborn as ever, he had put his engineering know-how (and most of his retirement savings) towards developing quite the sophisticated network of portable heaters to warm things up a bit! He was determined to make sure nothing would get in the way of him enjoying his retirement!

Unfortunately for him, the MouseHunters of Gnawnia managed to destroy all of his heaters, saving the festive season from thawing too early, and leaving this cold-averse mouse permanently stranded and underdressed in the frosty winter weather.

name: Costumed Rat Mouse
description:
Clever, witty, energetic, and optimistic, the metal rat adapts quickly, takes advantage of opportunities, and is very creative when left to its own devices.

With its fine attention to detail, the rat is fit for highly technical tasks, and hard work is rewarded with great financial gain! This one-mouse band, being its own tech operator, roadie, and lead guitarist all-in-one, allows the Costumed Rat Mouse to deliver a rewarding, killer performance all year!

name: Fete Fromager Mouse
description:
A fromager that specializes in special events and celebrations with an exceptional palate. This mouse has grown an obsessive appreciation for cheese with the drive to share this obsession with everyone whether they like it or not!

Most mice are lured into the presence of the Fete Fromager Mouse with the promise of all sorts of exotic cheeses from around the Kingdom, but the micromanagement of proper cheese tasting etiquette and consumption rules followed with the uninvited barrage of facts and history surrounding said cheese makes them regret that first fateful bite.

name: Admiral Cloudbeard
description:
Behold the "Sultan of the Skies", the "Conqueror of the Clouds", the "Tyrant at Ten Thousand Feet": Admiral Cloudbeard, leader of the Sky Pirates! This malevolent marauder is undefeated in hand-to-hook combat thanks to his massive, untamed beard making him an impossible target. His opponents can never tell where the beard ends and the Admiral begins. It's so thick that swords get stuck in it and shots get completely absorbed. Legend has it that his mighty beard has even survived being shot with a cannonball!

There is only one sky dweller brave enough to face the Admiral head-on and capable enough to come out of it alive and intact, his arch-nemesis: Ronza! The Admiral and his legion of ne'er-do-wells have been hunting Ronza and her enormous cache of chrome treasures for as long as they've sailed the skies. Unfortunately for them, she has consistently managed to elude, confuse, defeat, and humiliate Cloudbeard and his cronies at every turn. The Admiral has vowed to never give up on his quest for vengeance against that legendary sky captain, no matter how many limbs it costs him.

♫ We pirate, pillage, and plight,
Attacking every ship in flight!
Those that oppose, face the beard that he grows,
And he'll never give up the fight! ♫
- An ancient sky shanty

name: Agent M
description: This world class spy is notorious for his ability to sneak aboard airships undetected using an impressive collection of high-tech tools and advanced gadgetry. Once aboard, he can clear out all the loot from an airship's hull, no matter the size, in under sixty seconds and be gone before anyone notices. After each heist, this clandestine criminal likes to unwind with a cheese martini: shaken not stirred.

name: Paragon of Arcane
description:
This mystical creature possesses an absolute mastery of the Arcane powers, allowing it to unlock some of the mysteries of the universe and even to surpass the limits of the physical body. This mighty paragon has the ability to channel and manipulate raw Arcane power through its exquisite golden staff and use it for a wide variety of purposes, many of which are nefarious. Any hunter who is weak of will should not attempt to challenge this formidable adversary because it is said that, purely with the power of thought, it can burrow into the mind and disassemble its contents from the inside out.

The Paragon of Arcane devotes its existence to pursuing knowledge, unravelling the universe, and obliterating anything that stands in its way.
