"The mysteries of the Arcane are understood by few and mastered by fewer."

name: Astrological Astronomer Mouse
description:
Finding it difficult to survive on astrology alone, this resourceful mouse has diversified into astronomy to generate more business. She offers navigational guidance to adventurers while also divining their fortune for the voyage. This two-for-one deal gets them every time.

"While Saturn is in retrograde, your journey will either be successful or fail spectacularly! Make sure to look at the Grand Paw constellation then follow the second star to the right and straight on till morning."

name: Captain Cloudkicker
description:
The slow pace of sky flying allows this Captain to take flight and cruise the clouds with his special, shoulder-mounted airfoils. This remarkable contraption allows him to fly ahead of his airship so that he can scout for potential targets or dangers and keep his flightpath clear.

This captain is always the first one off the ship!

name: Cloud Miner Mouse
description:
It takes a lot of hard work, careful balance, and the willpower to never look down in order to become a successful Cloud Miner. These fearless mice perform the dangerous but essential task of mining Cloud Curds from the neighbouring cumulonimbi that have absorbed cheese vapour from the Queso River below.

After all that time mining Cloud Curds, these mice have lost their taste for Cloud Cheesecake. Their limited palate will only accept the distinctive flavours of SUPER|brie+ cheeses.

name: Cumulost Mouse
description: This melancholy mouse is a misunderstood lone wolf who is still battered and broken from battles lost long ago. With no friends, no family, and no place left to call home, these unfortunate souls are forced to wander the skies hopelessly searching for redemption. But don't be fooled by their defeated appearance, they will leap at any opportunity to engage in battle and reclaim their former glory.

name: Cute Cloud Conjurer Mouse
description: Behold! With a mere wave of his tiny paws, this cute, clever caster can conjure a cluster of clouds and carefully control their configuration with considerable clarity! Not harmful alone but this adorable little menace can provide the much needed cumulonimbi for other, more powerful, casters to draw their power from.

name: Cutthroat Cannoneer Mouse
description:
While you practiced the knife, she practiced the pistol. While you practiced the sword, she practiced the rifle. While you practiced the claymore, she practiced the cannon!

"Don't bring a stabber to a shoot fight!" - Cutthroat Cannoneer

name: Cutthroat Pirate Mouse
description: An impressive specimen and a fierce adversary! Pirating at such high altitudes has increased their lung capacity, lactic acid threshold, and muscle efficiency to unprecedented levels. Their aerial combat skills are so formidable that they have earned the admiration of the local parrot population who have willingly chosen to join their dastardly cause.

name: Daydreamer Mouse
description: This glossy-eyed daydreamer hasn't got a care in the world. They're usually found lying around the islands, watching the clouds float by, and searching for double rainbows.

name: Devious Gentleman Mouse
description: Highly intelligent, fiendishly clever, and disarmingly suave, you'll need keen wits and a level head to survive an encounter with a gentleman of this calibre. Using an endless supply of contraband gadgets and illicit tactics, this morally bankrupt mouse plans to steal all the riches of the islands and take the law into his own paws.

name: Paragon of Dragons
description: This mother of dragons is feared throughout the islands. She adorns herself with the gold and jewels that she has taken from her fallen enemies, wearing them as a symbol of both opulence and dominance. She brandishes a massive golden spear that is said to have been forged in the core of the largest volcano in the high altitude islands. Her temper is so volatile that the air around her ignites when she is angry. With her gigantic bat-like wings, she blocks out the sun, plunging the sky into darkness, as she descends from the clouds raining down fire and brimstone upon her foes.

name: Dragonbreather Mouse
description: Training at such high altitudes has acclimated these dragons by increasing their lung capacity allowing for more oxygen to burn when they breathe plumes of fire! Their fiery exhales eventually become so powerful that the sheer force thrusts them into the air, above their opponent, allowing them to hover in place!

name: Lancer Guard
description: These fierce and highly-disciplined guards are the progeny of the Paragon of Dragons. Their training begins at birth as they are immediately entered into a grueling daily regimen to teach them a mastery of aerial combat. Only the strongest survive into adulthood, at which point they are granted acceptance into the esteemed Lancer Guard. The sole purpose of this elite, deadly, and highly-secretive military regiment is to prevent unworthy adversaries from challenging the Paragon of Dragons.

name: Warden of Fog
description:
This gaseous form looms ominously above the islands: a grim folktale to some, a living nightmare to others. It is an all-consuming force that descends upon unwary explorers who are driven by a blind lust for treasure. Once engulfed, this sinister creature clouds their vision and obscures all of their navigational instruments. It renders its victims blind, helpless, and lost in an endless void of darkness.

It begins with a lull in the air followed by a sudden absence of all sound and smell: an eerie calm all around you. The last thing you see is a cloud of hopeless grey that washes over you, your ship, your crew, and then... nothingness.

name: Paragon of Forgotten
description:
With constant vigilance, this authority of the Forgotten sits and studies the passage of the world around him and commits everything he perceives to his perfect memory. He is considered a living almanac for all of Gnawnian history.

From his mossy perch on the high altitude islands, he peers down at the world below through his magnificent monocle to observe every event, every moment, and stores them all in his Forgotten Stone which ironically prevents him from forgetting anything! Practitioners of the Forgotten make the great pilgrimage to observe him as he records history in the making and to take the test of succession, with the hope of becoming the next Paragon, by answering this one question...

"The power to control the world lies in which finger?"

name: Warden of Frost
description: This cold-hearted creature perches atop the tallest mountains in the islands where the air is thinnest and most frigid. It remains perfectly still, as though frozen solid, until an airship approaches too closely. Once the ship flies within reach, this chilling monstrosity takes one massive swipe with its mighty arms and hurls a barrage of ice and hail with such tremendous force that it can obliterate even the sturdiest of hulls. So many over-zealous treasure seekers have met this icy fate over the centuries that the island elders believe the mountains themselves were built from the frozen remains of ancient airships.

name: Ground Gavaleer Mouse
description:
Not too keen on travel and wary of extreme heights, these specialized defenders guard clearings and other obvious landing sites on the islands. They stand ready to smash the anchors of invading airships or pound in grounding spikes to keep those that have already landed from escaping.

A giant croquet keeps the airship at bay!

name: Gyrologer Mouse
description: Make way for the bikers of the sky! Gyrologers ride together in tight formations and sometimes act as escorts for friendly dirigibles travelling between islands. Most of the time, they just like to cruise in groups and make sure you share the skies. You'll be able to easily recognize them from a distance due to their excessively loud vehicles and their compulsive need to rev them.

name: Herc
description: They say he possesses the strength of ten mice! Herc is the hero with a heart of gold who always fights for the little guy! He fends off invaders of the islands by leaping onto their airship in a single bound and chopping down the mast with one swift swing of his mighty battleaxe. His motives are so noble and pure that some have referred to him as the hero the Floating Island mice need but not the one they deserve.

name: Paragon of Water
description: This aquatic adversary is a master manipulator of moisture. With his powerful staff, he can draw water vapour from anywhere in his vicinity which he can use to simply dehydrate his opponent or, when he's feeling especially playful, pummel them with a deluge of typhonic proportions. When not battling mercilessly for control of the high altitude islands, this slippery scamp can be found gleefully soaring through the skies on a cloud while dropping torrential quantities of water on passing airships just to hear that satisfying splash.

name: Kite Flyer Mouse
description: A happy-go-lucky kite flyer that races along the launch pad chasing dirigibles and flying her kite alongside them. Hunters consider it lucky if one happens to hit their airship with a kite during take off!

name: Launchpad Labourer Mouse
description: These stocky, tireless workers are well-versed in the daily hustle of Launchpad life. They can typically be found scurrying around the skydocks, hauling supplies, and performing odd jobs. Whether you're loading cargo, repairing your dirigible, or you just need someone to listen to your aerial woes, Launchpad Labourers will be there!

name: Paragon of the Lawless
description: She is the most notorious mouse in all of Gnawnia and the fastest draw of all the lawless! Other than her quick shooting and dubious moral compass, this ruthless criminal also has a reputation for her extraordinary ability to hold her cheese; she can eat any mouse under the table. After growing tired of mundane bank robberies, stagecoach shenanigans, and run-of-the-mill shootouts with the authorities, this merry marauder has taken to the skies to pillage and plunder the Floating Island frontier!

name: Lawbender Mouse
description: This mouse is a zealous advocate for bending the law as far as it can go without breaking. He spends countless hours scanning case files, text books, citation guides, and treatises to make sure his fellow "law abiding" citizens can maintain a clean slate while "salvaging" ships and "liberating" loot.

name: Mairitime Pirate Mouse
description: A Mairitime pilot with an emphasis on the "air". Sky Pirates swoop down upon their seafaring cousins when they need elite pilots for their airships. Without the restrictions of water, these seasoned sailors can manoeuvre a dirigible through the clouds with unmatched elegance. Unfortunately, many of these old seadogs tend to suffer from severe airsickness during their first few voyages.

name: Mist Maker Mouse
description: These seemingly meek and mellow mice are hiding a dangerous secret behind that misty veil. They have the unique ability to draw moisture from everything in their surroundings, including any nearby hunters, and coalesce it into an impenetrable shield of mist. Do not be fooled by their gentle eyes and modest size, these mice make formidable adversaries.

name: Nimbomancer Mouse
description: These tiny but mighty creatures have the unique power to extract water directly from the air and coalesce it into nimbus clouds. They use these clouds as reservoirs to store massive amounts of hydro power from which to draw upon during battle.

name: Overcaster Mouse
description:
This sinister creature releases a concentration of shadow magic into the atmosphere which adheres to the surrounding water vapour and causes it to condense into impenetrable black clouds. These clouds can then be used as cover, transportation, or as a reservoir for storing shadow energy.

These mice are believed to be responsible for the notorious trojan thundercloud tactic of bygone lore.

name: Paragon of Strength
description: This extraordinary mouse is a specimen of peak physical perfection. She is an expert in all forms of martial combat and is as deadly with a weapon as she is without. She has been rigorously training atop the highest island mountains since infancy. After countless years of intense conditioning in that thin atmosphere, her body has acclimated to the point where her endurance has become nearly infinite and her monstrous physical strength has become downright terrifying. Rumour has it that she wrestles Sandstorm Monstrobots as a cooldown after her workouts. Any hunter brazen enough to challenge this mountain of a mouse had better not skip leg day.

name: Warden of Rain
description: A tsunami of power embodied within a cumulonimbus of rage. She began as a single, fallen tear from a scorned mouse over the steep edge of Moussu Picchu. The tear was hurled up into the atmosphere at tremendous speeds by the region's intensely shifting winds and was charged with supernatural fury by passing through the magical storms at the mountain's peak. The tear grew into the epicenter of this incredible anomaly of rain and wrath whose sole purpose is to enact a watery vengeance upon Gnawnian hunters who attempt to invade the islands.

name: Regal Spearman Mouse
description: These iron-willed guardsmen are renowned throughout the islands for their steadfast loyalty. They are subjected to thousands of hours of training in order to build the endurance necessary to hover in place, guarding a single aerial location, for hours, or even days, on end. What some consider even more remarkable is their ability to look so good while doing it.

name: Richard the Rich
description: While the rich get richer, Richard gets richest! A lot of the "lost" treasures once found among the Floating Islands have ended up in Richard's hands one way or another. It is rumoured that he has a privately-stocked cheese shoppe as well as a swimming pool full of gold coins aboard his floating sky yacht!

name: Scarlet Revenger Mouse
description: Once a victim of piracy herself, this intrepid mouse set out on a path of vengeance against the Sky Pirates which eventually lead to the discovery of her one true passion: pirating! Now this crimson-haired raider sails the skies solely to pirate the pirates! With her fiery temper and mane to match, those that cross her will end up seeing more flowing red than just her hair!

name: Seasoned Islandographer Mouse
description: Busy, busy, busy! This specialized cartographer creates highly detailed maps of all the islands but since they are constantly moving, he is constantly working!

name: Paragon of Shadow
description:
Ancient island folklore tells a tale of the Harbinger of Night: a mouse so dark and powerful that its very presence frightens away the sun. For generations, parents on the Floating Islands have used this old yarn to scare their children into returning home before dusk. Unlike many legends however, this story has a terrifying truth to it. The Paragon of Shadow is believed to be one of the most powerful shadow casters in existence and is a very real threat to anyone brave (or foolish) enough to travel to the high altitude islands.

Be warned, all ye who sail into the darkness, a small mouse can cast a very large shadow.

name: Shadow Sage Mouse
description: These doyens of the dark arts are said to be as dangerous as they are mysterious. They practice a form of shadow magic so old and so powerful that even most other shadow casters tremble in their presence. There are legends that these sinister sages are older than the very islands on which they live. While other, more outlandish tales, describe them as the ones who created the night itself.

name: Sky Dancer Mouse
description: These magnificent creatures glide through the skies with incredible poise and grace. They are extraordinarily beautiful but suspiciously captivating. Watching them dance elegantly on the breeze is so serene that it can quickly become hypnotic. These winged beauties always travel in pairs so that one can use its majestic moves as an entrancing distraction while the other hovers menacingly behind their target.

name: Sky Glass Glazier
description: A giggling glass glazier that shapes and forms Sky Glass for its many uses as jewelry, weapons, tools, and other, more mysterious, purposes. The process causes a perpetual tingling sensation to cascade through their body, tickling them constantly. It is unclear whether their goofy grin is a product of glee or madness.

name: Sky Glass Sorcerer Mouse
description: By channeling arcane powers from their grand Sky Glass staves, these tiny casters can make big trouble for those travelling the Floating Islands.

name: Sky Greaser Mouse
description: A scruffy, servicewoman of the skies. She works tirelessly to keep her dirigible in tip-top shape. Unfortunately, with the cost of spare parts being so high, she might just steal from yours to keep up!

name: Sky Highborne Mouse
description: A fierce and powerful member of an ancient royal family that has reigned over the arcane islands for countless generations. She has a reputation for being extremely generous to her subjects but equally ruthless to her adversaries. Her volatile temperament inspires unwavering loyalty in her friends and mortal terror in her foes.

name: Sky Squire Mouse
description: A novice swordsman who has recently begun training as a squire for one of the many renowned warriors on the Floating Islands. It's tough work and these young mice still have a lot to learn. However, don't be fooled by their lack of size, strength, knowledge, experience, and aptitude. What they lack in skill, they more than make up for in being catastrophically uncoordinated and dangerously incompetent.

name: Sky Surfer
description: His ability to shape and steer the condensed water droplets that make up clouds allows him to surf the skies on their backs. His high fives make quite a splash! Winds up, brah!

name: Sky Swordsman Mouse
description: Masters in the art of aerial swordsmanship, these practitioners have learned techniques beyond your wildest imagination! Trained with heightened sensitivity to the wind, they utilize natural gusts and zephyrs to do the heavy lifting of their swords and bolster their striking force. Being able to gracefully leap through the air and swing with very little effort makes these tiny warriors into formidable opponents with almost limitless stamina.

name: Skydiver Mouse
description: By using the local dragonvine plant and a lot of ingenuity, these sky-bound daredevils have managed to build themselves some precarious, though surprisingly effective, parachutes. They love to leap from the launch pad high atop the mountain ranges of Moussu Picchu and soar the skies! They will also attempt to hijack any airship they land on to fly them back up!

name: Spheric Diviner
description:
These mice use an old but effective way of predicting the movements of the islands. By studying miniscule changes in atmospheric pressure, divined through a special sky glass rod, they can predict the paths of the various floating islands which gives them a considerable edge in sky exploration.

"Why go to them when they can come to us!" - First of the Divine

name: Spry Sky Explorer Mouse
description: This worn and weathered explorer may have seen better days but don't let a few bandages and missing limbs fool you, he is still a very capable adventurer! That cane he leans on possesses a powerful Seer's Sky Glass crystal and over many decades (or maybe centuries), he has learned to channel its power to guide him swiftly through the islands.

name: Spry Sky Seer Mouse
description: They say she's as old as the sky itself and twice as wise! This ancient wonder is remarkably sharp and always keeps a keen eye on her Sky Glass crystal. By gazing into it, she can foretell the coming shifts in the islands and predict the future for wary travellers.

name: Stack of Thieves
description: Watch out for this three-headed thief that is bound to stack the odds against you! A skilled team of unsavoury mice that have found each other through shady happenstance. Each one specializes in a particular art of thievery: a master of disguise, a maven of sleight of hand, and a professional tool man. They can quickly, but clumsily, shift positions depending on the requirements of each heist.

name: Stratocaster Mouse
description: She is considered the rock star of the shadow-controlled islands and she's got an attitude to match the moniker. She is rumoured to be so powerful, with a disposition so volatile, that she could throw a piece of the moon at you for merely getting in her way. These gifted few have earned the right to wield the powerful crescent sceptre and read from the mystical book of skyshadows.

name: Suave Pirate Mouse
description: This charismatic character is smooth, sultry, and the definition of debonair. Be wary of him charming his way onto your ship because this suave sailor is out to steal more than just your loot. Before you know it, he'll have disappeared into the clouds, leaving you with an empty hull and a broken heart.

name: Paragon of Tactics
description:
This highly-sophisticated, expertly-constructed, and maniacally-designed tactical exoskeleton consists of gadgets and gizmos aplenty with whozits and whatzits galore! Its cutting-edge but dangerously unpredictable artificial intelligence system gathers data after every encounter and is constantly improving its response to unexpected stimuli. It is unclear whether the mouse inside actually controls this monstrosity or if it too is an unintended victim of the deadly machine's erratic programming.

Some believe that its original creator is a brilliant but criminally insane mouse that lives in a hidden lab on the islands, collecting battle data, and improving its masterpiece remotely. While others have postulated that this contraption was actually the work of an ingenious but ill-fated hunter who tried to build the ultimate mousetrap but ended up creating something far more dangerous than the mice it was intended to catch.

name: Tiny Dragonfly Mouse
description: Swift, vengeful and very, very small! Not too bothersome alone or in pairs but be careful of dark clouds that seem to emit a loud, buzzing sound...

name: Warden of Wind
description: This swirling tempest of unknown origin believes that no earthbound mortal is worthy to soar among his winds. He approaches airships with a subtle breeze and gently guides them into his center without their knowledge. Once the ship is within his grasp, this turbulent terror rends it apart from bow to stern with punishing gale-force gusts and a flurry of cyclones. He is relentless in his pursuit of trespassers and as such, none have survived his blustering assaults with their airships intact.

name: Worried Wayfinder Mouse
description: Check, double check, triple check! This mouse is anxiously over-prepared with at least three copies of every map and flight plan at the ready. However, she is also frequently prone to mistakes which makes her as much of an asset as she is a liability. Just make sure to double check her triple checks!

name: Great Giftnapper Mouse
description:
One greedy mouse took all the gifts one season.
Now, please don't ask why. No one quite knows the reason.

Perhaps he never quite got what he wanted,
While others that did just looked on and taunted.

Paul always got everything on his festive list,
But this mouse's wishes were just ignored and missed.

"Now, why do I never get what I ask?",
he yelled out loud with a huff and a gasp.

In a rage, he went out and stole someone's gift,
It was easy and fun and boy, were they miffed!

His eyes lit up, he knew just what to do!
"I'll go to Paul's house and steal his gifts too!"

But he didn't stop there, that was just the beginning,
"I must steal every gift!", he considered while grinning.

So off he went, down their chimneys with glee,
Grabbing all the gifts from under each tree.

The children awoke to a tree that was bare,
They cried and they screamed, "Why, this just isn't fair!"

But the hunters were brave and captured this mouse,
And returned all the gifts to each empty house.

So Gnawnia was saved from this dastardly stunt,
T'was good tidings to all and a Great Winter Hunt!

name: Costumed Ox Mouse
description:
The year of the Ox is going to be a lucky one! Hard work will be rewarded and it will be the perfect time to develop personal relationships.

A quiet strength radiates from the Mighty Ox. He is dependable and hardworking yet stubborn and set in his ways. His love for lattes gives him the energy to power through even the most difficult of tasks as he works hard to enjoy a comfortable retirement.

name: Space Party-Time Plumber Mouse
description:
There's always a party sometime that needs the services of a Space Party-Time Plumber to keep the good times flowing. Using the Arrow of Time, these temporal tradesmice can redirect the flow of time itself to revert a clogged pipe back to before the problem even began!

With the Arrow of Time, these resourceful rodents can take the party into the 4th dimension!

name: Sky Glider Mouse
description: Surrounded by cuddly clouds amidst the wide open sky is where these magical mice feel at home. These arcane aerial specialists use their sorcery to soar above the weather where the skies are always clear.

name: Consumed Charm Tinkerer Mouse
description:
This highly skilled artisan and crafter of fine charms is obsessed with the massive quantities of Raw Ancient Jade that is so plentiful in the Empyrean Sky Palace. After discovering the incredible potential of this ancient mineral, these tinkerers have gone out en masse to collect, catalogue, and craft as much as they possibly can.

It's a good thing too because the process involved in shaping this coveted material can be quite explosive...

name: Empyrean Geologist Mouse
description: Only the finest Cloudstones can be fashioned into Empyrean Seals so only the most meticulous experts can be employed to choose them. The Empyrean Geologist mice spend decades upon decades studying Cloudstones and as a result, have developed the ability to spot even the most minor of imperfections in the majestic crystalline structures. These talented mice are so dedicated to their work that they can often be found obsessively studying the Empyrean Seals even after they've been minted.

name: Empyrean Javelineer Mouse
description: This highly decorated Empyrean guard specializes in the javelin. Due to the lack of any intruders, this guard has gradually become more lax in his duties. In recent decades, he has become more of a sportsman than a soldier. More often than not, thieves easily sneak by while he is showing off to his buddies how far he can throw his javelin.

name: Forgotten Elder Mouse
description:
An old and powerful weaver of the forgotten arts. Those that no longer seek to remember what was forgotten become forgotten themselves. Only those who have reached this pinnacle of forgetfulness are permitted to sunset among the Sky Palace grounds. They live only in the present for there is nothing left to forget.

Don't let their appearance fool you as they are at their most powerful once they have forgotten even themselves!

name: Cloud Strider Mouse
description:
Cloud Conjurers with the most experience and seniority look forward to being promoted to the most comfortable post in all the Floating Islands: the Cloud Striders. The job is peaceful, relaxing, and offers a lot of free time during patrol routes.

"He who walks with cloud need not take a single step!" - Fluffy Cloudlet

name: Aristo-Cat Burglar Mouse
description:
This affluent aristocrat is a member of high society by day and an impressive cat burglar by night. It is not the score that drives these devious individuals to do what they do but rather the thrill of the steal and the intoxicating effect of rapidly pumping adrenaline as they narrowly avoid capture at every turn.

After all, what is one more trinket upon a pile of many?

name: Fortuitous Fool Mouse
description:
An interesting strategy used to protect the vast hoards of loot in the Sky Palace is to employ the talented thieves that successfully break in. They get to keep all the treasure but it can't leave the vaults... and neither can they!

With all the treasure they could ever want, these mice are content to just stay and frolic in their good fortune but will not hesitate to stand in the way of anyone who attempts to intervene in their indulgence!

name: Empyrean Appraiser Mouse
description: Atop the peak of Priceless Point (the tallest spire of the tallest tower in the Sky Palace), the most experienced and sophisticated appraisers sit to view their minerals in the purest natural light, unobstructed and unfiltered by the layers of atmosphere below. In this pristine environment the appraisers are able to detect even the most minute flaws in every piece of ore and glass that they inspect. Only the finest pieces are kept for the palace while the rest are tossed from the palisade down to the lower islands.

name: Glamorous Gladiator Mouse
description: This once hungry and determined guardian of the Sky Palace has become complacent over the years due to the lack of worthy challengers ever since the Sky Palace was cut off from the lands below. Once a shining example of physical prowess, this mouse's focus has gone from glutes to glamour, from strength training to bodybuilding, and from sword fighting to sword polishing. Now that the hunters of Gnawnia have found a way to reach the Empyrean Sky Palace, this mouse will be facing an even tougher challenge than maintaining those luscious golden locks.

name: Peggy the Plunderer
description:
The prettiest pirate ever to plunder the palace! If you look up "Plunder" in the Pirate's Code book you'll find a picture of Peggy! No other pirate has ever been as clever, crafty, or nearly as successful!

Peggy has worked long and hard to earn her place amongst the greatest pirates ever to sail the skies. You might even say it cost her an arm and two legs!

name: Zealous Academic Mouse
description: This lifelong scholar is obsessed with acquiring knowledge and accumulating spells. Entirely engrossed and thoroughly distracted, this mouse shouldn't prove much of a threat... depending on what spell he is currently studying.

name: Rocketeer Mouse
description: This untrained rocket enthusiast has flown way off course and ended up as part of the Empyrean Guard at the Sky Palace despite being grossly unqualified.

name: Empyrean Empress
description:
Much like her Sky Wardens, the Empyrean Empress is more of an absolute force of nature than a mouse. She is a perfect balance of the raw energies coalesced from the eight power types found within the Floating Islands. Her powers are so incomprehensibly vast that it is believed that she single-handedly built the Empyrean Sky Palace using nothing but sheer force of will.

Capturing her physical form is one of the greatest tests of strength and bravery for any mouse hunter but it is only a minor inconvenience for a being as mighty as the Empress. Her ethereal form is eternal and not tied to any singular existence which is what allows her to appear in all vaults within the Sky Palace simultaneously and perpetually.

name: Baba Gaga
description:
Gnawnian folklore is filled with tales of a sinister and flamboyant witch who lives deep in the woods North of the Toxic Spill. Some tales tell of the mortar and pestle that she uses to soar through the night skies while others describe her hypnotic singing voice that can be heard for miles. Some legends depict her brewing foul potions in a straw-thatched hut that sits atop giant chicken legs while others focus on her strange and exotic clothing that could only come from another world.

But one thing that every tale had in common was that Baba Gaga was nothing more than a myth... until now!

name: Ol' King Coal
description:
Self made from head to toe, this Rolex-wearing, diamond-mining, limousine-riding, jet-flying, self-proclaimed boss man is the big cheese, top mouse, and grand poobah of his industry... or any industry! He's got the biggest house, on the biggest hill, on the biggest side of town and he's also got the biggest carbon footprint to match his great big alligator skin shoes!

As the world leader in coal production and all other fossil fuels, not much can tear him away from his dirty work except for his hatred of the renewable fuel source: Compressed Cinnamon! This ultra-clean and ultra-festive fuel threatens his bottom line so he has vowed to take care of it... personally!

Ol' King Coal was a greedy old soul,
and a greedy old soul was he.

"I pollute the world with all my coal,
cause it makes lots o' money for me!"

name: Angry Aphid Mouse
description: This well dressed, indignant insect is a common sight in the fields of the Foreword Farm. The only thing snappier than their sense of style is their curt, acrimonious disposition. They're well known for their poignant jabs, incessant scoffing, and their insatiable appetite for leafy greens which draws them out to even the most sparsely planted fields.

name: Architeuthulhu of the Abyss
description:
In the darkest depths of the Prologue Pond, a great and terrible beast waits dreaming. It makes its home amongst the sunken wrecks of foolish adventurers who sought its treasure. Some believe it is as old as the pond itself while others claim it is far older still. A being born from the darkest corners of the subconscious, meant only to reside in legends too terrifying to speak aloud. A being that could only be brought into existence by the awesome and transcendent power of the Folklore Forest.

Whatever its mystical origins may be, the threat of the mighty Architeuthulhu is very real and very present in the deepest waters of the Prologue Pond. Fortunately, timid hunters can avoid the piercing gaze of its haunting yellow eyes by simply not wandering too far out from shore and staying away from inclement weather. However, hunters who are brave enough to take on this indomitable challenge must summon a storm as vile and menacing as Architeuthulu's wrath by arming Stormy Clamembert cheese. Once this volatile cheese breaks the surface of the water, Architeuthulhu will rise from its abyss with all of its valuable treasures in tow!

name: Beachcomber Mouse
description: This tiny but fearless adventurer roams the shoreline of the Prologue Pond atop its trusty pet Griselda, the Ingenuity Grub. Together they search for lost treasures buried in the sand to add to their sizeable collection. Many of the other mice in the area find this precocious chap to be a bit of a nuisance but they tolerate the Beachcomber's shenanigans because of how thoroughly it cleans up junk from the beach.

name: Bitter Grammarian
description:
This overworked and underappreciated assistant to the Mythweaver has become so consumed by her quest for grammatical perfection that it has transformed her into a disgruntled, cantankerous, and downright wrathful warrior on behalf of linguistic precision. She is a master of morphology, a tutelary of tense, a soldier of syntax, and a champion of the clause! She is the most feared and revered editor in the murine literary world and the only mouse in Gnawnia bold enough to make corrections to the Mythweaver's own writing.

Study hard and gather your wits before attempting to cross quills with this perilous punctuator!

name: Brothers Grimmaus
description: These two hardworking brothers have dedicated their lives to collecting, cataloguing, and interpreting much of what the mice of today know as the staples of murine folklore. Their most famous works include: "Little Red Riding Mouse", "The Rat Prince", "Mouserella", and "Rodentstiltskin". They have received some criticism over the years for the dark and often macabre tone in many of their of stories but that was precisely why the Mythweaver sought to employ their services.

name: Careless Catfish Mouse
description: This clumsy, nonchalant pond dweller lives his life with reckless abandon. He says what he wants, does what he wants, and pays no nevermind to how it affects his aquatic colleagues in the shallow end of the Prologue Pond. As a result, he's not the most popular fish in the pond but he swims with a smile on his face.

name: Covetous Coastguard Mouse
description: When it comes to hoarding Ingenuity Grubs, you'll find no mouse better or greedier than the Covetous Coastguard! He is a grizzled, prickly fellow who sees himself as an authority on the shores of the Prologue Pond. He's not afraid to get his feet wet or his hands dirty and can be found grub gathering rain or shine. He has a laser focus and a one-track mind so the only thing that can distract him from his search is the sweet smell of SUPER|brie+.

name: Crazed Cultivator Mouse
description: This frenetic, go-getter has developed a rather unhealthy obsession with Papyrus Seeds in the Foreword Farm. No one knows what she does with all of them but whatever it is must be big, elaborate, and very bizarre. She is so consumed by her endless search for seeds that she is not even deterred by the presence of Petulant Pests! The only thing that can momentarily lure her away from her beloved seeds is the irresistible scent of SUPER|brie+.

name: Fibbocchio
description: This little wooden character has big dreams of one day becoming a real mouse! Aided by his prudent sidekick, he goes on many adventures where he often finds himself in trouble due to his propensity for fabrication which is as plain as the nose on his face.

name: Flamboyant Flautist
description: This flashy, extravagant, and extremely talented mouse plays his flute so well that other mice can't help but keep the beat and follow the tune wherever it may lead.

name: Greenbeard
description: This wealthy noblemouse lives in a luxurious palace in the countryside full of riches and wonders galore. Despite his affluence, he is not very popular with the ladies due to his poor manners, lack of charisma, and his bold but tasteless grooming choices.

name: Grit Grifter Mouse
description: Looking for a deal, a steal, the bargain of a lifetime? Then look no further than this crafty flimflam mouse with its devious smile and utter lack of morals! The Grit Grifter can be found in the shadier parts of the Foreword Farm where a hunter needs to watch their back and have their wits about them. This sneaky swindler is a surefire way to collect Papyrus Seeds just as long as you don't ask where they came from.

name: Hans Cheesetian Squeakersen
description: This highly esteemed author is well-known by mice all across the land and his name has become synonymous with murine folklore and fairy tales. There is scarcely a mouse anywhere that couldn't name at least a few of his most famous works including: "The Princess and the Olive", "The Ice Regent", "Pinkielina", and "The Ugly Mouseling". It is no surprise therefore that he was the first one recruited by the Mythweaver to assist in his dastardly plot to rewrite Gnawnian history.

name: Humphrey Dumphrey
description: This rotund rodent has an inclination for dangerous heights and living on the edge despite his brittle frame and terrible sense of balance.

name: Ice Regent
description: This frosty and formidable monarch rules over her wintry wasteland with an icy fist. She is most well-known for her chilly disposition, impeccable fashion sense, and her cavalier attitude towards letting things go.

name: Land Loafer Mouse
description: Seed collecting on the Foreword Farm can be tough, back-breaking work and it takes a mouse with real gumption to get the job done day in and day out. This mouse, on the other hand, is the exception to that rule. The Land Loafer is a professional layabout, well-versed in the art of finding just the right mound to lean on and just the right angle to tip its hat to block out the sun for a not-so-well-deserved nap. Lackadaisical as it may be, this clever mouse still manages to get the job done each day and somehow finds a way to collect even more Papyrus Seeds than many of its co-workers with only a fraction of the effort.

name: Little Bo Squeak
description: This naive, forgetful young shepherd is a character mostly known for perfecting the art of giving up and allowing problems to sort themselves out.

name: Little Miss Fluffet
description: This dainty, recognizable, and severely arachnophobic nursery rhyme character is well-known for her insatiable appetite for curds and whey and her jumpy disposition.

name: Loathsome Locust Mouse
description: Most of the time the Loathsome Locusts exist in a passive, dormant state and will only swarm a farmer's field under very specific conditions. When those conditions are met and the vegetation is just right, these irritating but extremely lucrative creatures will darken the skies and descend upon the fertile fields in an effort to gorge themselves on delicious crops. Fortunately for the farmers, these clueless critters get so focused on stuffing themselves with flavourful foliage that they don't put up much of a defence. When these mischievous malfeasants do manage to make off with a belly full, they like to add insult to injury by playing a woeful tune on their tiny violins to mock the unfortunate farmer.

name: Madame d'Ormouse
description: This dignified and highly respected author may not be as widely known as some of her colleagues but those in the know consider her to be the originator of the term "fairy tale". Of her long list of writing credits, the most influential include: "Princess Mousette", "The Mouse and the Orange Cheese", "The Little Good Mouse", and "Silverlocks and the Three Mice". Her immense knowledge of folklore and commanding presence in the literary community are both essential ingredients in the potential success of the Mythweaver's plan.

name: Matriarch Gander Mouse
description:
This prolific writer is something of a mystery even to her fellow authors. No one has ever been able to determine definitively whether or not she is in fact a fictional character herself. Some literary scholars have theorized that she is both an author and a character and that she simply imagined herself into existence one day... although this theory is not very popular due its profound existential suggestions. Regardless of the ambiguous nature of her existence, she has proven herself to be a talented author and a compelling character so she and her trusty gander sidekick were must-haves for the Mythweaver's roster of literary talent. Her most famous works include: "Little Miss Fluffet", "Little Bo Squeak", "Humphrey Dumphrey", and "Three Sighted Mice".

This high-profile author has high-profile taste buds and will therefore turn her nose up at anything that isn't SUPER|brie+.

name: Melodramatic Minnow Mouse
description:
This is the most unfortunate, unfairly treated, and tragedy-stricken mouse to have ever existed in the entire history of Gnawnia and also no stranger to hyperbole. It is often referred to politely as being "a bit theatrical" and less politely as being "a whiny nuisance". Hunters that frequent the shallow end of the Prologue Pond will quickly become familiar with this mouse's incessant lamentations.

"O woe, O woeful, woeful, woeful day! Most lamentable day, most woeful day that ever, ever I did yet behold!"

name: Mighty Mite Mouse
description: What this miniscule mouse lacks in size, it more than makes up for in brute strength, bravado, and showmanship! He thrives on showing off his impressive physique to the other pests that frequent the Foreword Farm but his fragile ego prevents him from doing so until the field is full of plants for him to lift. Hunters should be warned that this tiny terror won't go down without a fight but if they can manage to best him then they'll collect a sizeable reward of Crop Coins for their trouble.

name: Mythweaver
description:
Many a cautionary tale has been written about the dangers of hubris but few are as poignant or consequential as the one being penned by the Mythweaver.

This once meek and meager mouse began its story as a simple Bookborn willed into existence by the maniacal Zurreal the Eternal. There was something unique about this particular manifestation however and it caused Zurreal to take special notice. This Bookborn exhibited more intelligence, intuition, and understanding than the rest of its kind and so Zurreal decided to share small fragments of his immense knowledge with this curious creature. As the Bookborn consumed more knowledge, its abilities began to grow and so too did its usefulness. Zurreal recognized an opportunity to mold and shape this exceptional creation into a powerful assistant capable of expediting his plans to conquer humans and mice alike.

Unbeknownst to Zurreal, this creature was consuming knowledge at an unimaginable rate and before long, its intelligence and understanding had begun to surpass even its master's. This nameless creation eventually sought to have an identity of its own and, having developed a particular fascination with the countless volumes of folklore contained in the Crystal Library, began calling itself the Mythweaver. The Mythweaver began to recognize that he was merely a servant to an insane and tyrannical leader, a mere cog in a broken machine. And with that profound realization, this ethereal creature transformed into a unique and extraordinarily powerful mouse! On that day, the Mythweaver vowed to turn against his creator and become a true leader of mice; dedicated not only to their survival but to their supremacy in the land of Gnawnia!

So the Mythweaver scoured every inch of the great library in search of a means by which he could conquer the kingdom on behalf of his kind and one day he found what he had been searching for. Hidden inside a forgotten book on a forgotten shelf, the Mythweaver discovered a single page that Zurreal had missed all these years. This enchanted page was written by Zugzwang himself and on it he learned of a secret place of unprecedented power: the Folklore Forest!

He learned that deep in the Folklore Forest there exists a magical Book of Lore which contains the entire history of Gnawnia scribbled throughout its pages. What is special about this book however, is that if the words on these pages are changed then so too will history itself be changed. And thus began the Mythweaver's quest to rewrite history by writing the mice as the glorious champions and the humans as the vanquished foes!

name: Nefarious Nautilus Mouse
description: This shifty, cantankerous deep water dweller is so old that she is often called a "living fossil"... but only a fool would say that to her face! Despite her age, she is a formidable opponent because although she may not be as fast or agile as she used to be, she has a hard stare that can reduce even the bravest hunter into cowering puddle of tears.

name: Pinkielina
description: At roughly the size of a pinkie finger, this miniscule mouse has a small stature but a big appetite for adventure. Her largest hurdles in life are toads, beetles, and inclement weather.

name: Pompous Perch Mouse
description: This aquatic aristocrat only hobnobs with the most exclusive and most shallow social swimming circles in the Prologue Pond. She dresses in the finest gowns, dons the most ornate jewelry, has perfected the haughty harrumph, and never goes anywhere without her beloved vanity pet, Gil.

name: Princess and the Olive
description: This royal rodent is a character mainly known for extreme fatigue, hypersensitivity, and poor lumbar support.

name: Root Rummager Mouse
description: Few mice enjoy digging in the dirt as much as this opportunistic scrounger. The Root Rummager has a distinct taste for seeds that have already begun to germinate and therefore has a penchant for digging them out of the ground: roots, stalk, and all! These mice tend to be easier to track due to the trail of dirt that follows them wherever they go but the seeds they carry often require a bit of trimming and untangling before they can be reused.

name: Sand Sifter Mouse
description: This profitable prospector has turned Ingenuity Grub gathering into an exact science. The Sand Sifter has mapped out all the best digging spots along the Prologue Pond shoreline and has made a name for itself around the pond as a skilled, determined, and borderline obsessive gatherer.

name: Sinister Squid Mouse
description: This crafty, conniving creature has many malevolent tricks up his sleeve. He lurks in the deep end of the Prologue Pond where the water is as dark and murky as his intentions. Hunters are not recommended to make any deals with him lest they find out the hard way that with a Sinister Squid there is always a catch!

name: Tackle Tracker Mouse
description: The Tackle Tracker is known for two things: she's fantastic at gathering Ingenuity Grubs and she's a terrible house guest. She has an unparalleled ability to track down useful tackle along the Prologue Pond shoreline but you can always tell where she's been because she leaves an enormous mess in her wake.

name: Vicious Vampire Squid Mouse
description: Many perilous horrors can be found swimming around the depths of the Prologue Pond but few are as bone-chilling as this elegant but ruthless enchantress of the deep. She is of the genus Musculus Vampyroteuthis Infernalis and she is most widely known and feared for her impressive strength, large hypnotic eyes, and her impeccable sense of style. This cruel countess comes from an old and very wealthy lineage so hunters who are brave enough to face her are likely to be handsomely rewarded for their efforts.... if they succeed.

name: Wily Weevil Mouse
description: Don't be fooled by her matronly, unassuming appearance, this crafty critter is one of the more irritating pests wandering the fields of the Foreword Farm. You may think she's just tidying up around the garden but the next thing you know, she'll have stunted the growth of all your precious crops! This deceptive dowager has a discerning palette and will only frequent fields that are at least mostly full of flavorful flora. Fortunately, hunters who are capable of catching this mischievous mouse will find a decent number of Crop Coins stashed in her apron.

name: Monstrous Midge Mouse
description:
This horrifying, hulking monstrosity is the ultimate scourge of the Foreword Farm. It is a ruthless and menacing pest with a large but very specific appetite and will therefore only target fields that are full of its favourite crop. This terrifying but remarkably well-dressed creature may be less common than other species of midges but it is equally as annoying and far more dangerous. Seasoned farmers are all too accustomed to the ominous hum that precedes the coming of these predatory pests so much so that even the mere memory of it is enough to keep them up at night.

There is a famous and forboding passage in the Gnawnian Farmer's Almanac that reads:
"When a sky of fire sings its tune,
A farmer knows the end is soon."

Only the bravest hunters looking for a formidable challenge should dare to face off against this frightening foe. However, fortune tends to favour the bold so those who do succeed in catching the Monstrous Midge will find themselves handsomely rewarded!

name: Frost King
description:
This once warm and cheery fellow has always enjoyed the festive season... perhaps a little too much. As a youngster, he would look forward to the holidays all year long but when they finally arrived, all he could think of was how soon they would be gone again. Over time, the warmth that he once felt for this magical season was replaced by an icy cold sliver in his heart that grew and grew until it eventually consumed him, transforming him completely from head to toe.

Driven mad by obsession, he became convinced that he could capture the magic of the holidays and keep it forever simply by freezing the festive season in place. And so he set to work on a plan to usher in an infinite winter to the Kingdom of Gnawnia.

By harnessing the power of his Magical Holiday Scarf, the self-proclaimed Frost King conjured a fortress made of Reinforced Ice and constructed the nefarious Frost Globes that would allow him to turn this luscious landscape into a frozen prison from which the festive season could never escape!

name: Baroness Von Bean
description: This impressive but intimidating noblewoman needs no introduction when she enters the Great Hall because, for better or worse, her reputation precedes her. She is a crafty, confident, and callous cutthroat who will stop at nothing to achieve her ultimate goal of controlling all of the beans in the Kingdom!

name: Baroque Dancer Mouse
description:
No one in the Ballroom can take their eyes off of this well-dressed aristocrat who is brimming with grandeur, flamboyance, and exuberant details... and that's just their wardrobe! The real talk of the Ballroom is the unique and unusual dance style that they've brought to the party. It involves many strange and captivating moves such as TopRococo, Snapping and Latching, and their signature move: the Cranium Oscillation.

Rumour has it that this bizarre, modern dance style was learned on "the streets" although that claim seems dubious considering the lack of roadways at this altitude.

name: Budrich Thornborn
description: This beautiful but prickly creature is the leader of the clan Thornborn and is a direct descendant of the legendary Thornborns of antiquity who are said to have grown from the first buds of the Bountiful Beanstalk.

name: Cagey Countess Mouse
description: This clever, cunning, and dangerously duplicitous noblewoman presides over extensive sections of the Cloud District. She is revered and feared throughout the Castle in the Clouds and many believe that she not only has the King's ear but that she is in fact the source of many of his most tyrannical decrees. Her true ambitions are some of the most closely guarded secrets in the castle but whatever they may be, they are most likely not benevolent.

name: Cell Sweeper Mouse
description: Some mice work very hard and eventually find a career that is dynamic, engaging, and fulfilling. This is not one of those mice. The Cell Sweeper has been tasked with the thankless job of cleaning prison cells in an infinite dungeon. It's certainly not how he envisioned his future but it's not all bad, sometimes he can faintly hear the sounds of music, laughter, and enjoyment bleeding down from the ballroom above. At least, that's what he assumes those sounds are, since he's never actually experienced any of those things firsthand.

name: Chafed Cellist Mouse
description: This stout and surly character never lets his small stature prevent him from making a big impact on his audience. Judging by how he treats the strings on that cello, it's probably best not to rub him the wrong way!

name: Clumsy Cupbearer Mouse
description: This earnest but uncoordinated mouse is no stranger to misfortune... and neither are the royals that employ her for their libations. Despite her best efforts, she consistently stumbles from one mishap into the next and as a result, all the white carpets and linens have been permanently removed from the Great Hall.

name: Dastardly Duchess Mouse
description: A great many sinister plots have unfolded in the Great Hall over the years and somehow this callous and calculating mouse always remains unscathed at the centre of it all. She spins a web of deceit so intricate throughout the Castle in the Clouds that even her spies have spies. She is so staunch and stoic that if she so much as raises an eyebrow in your general direction then it's already too late!

name: Diminutive Detainee Mouse
description: This mouse is living proof of the age-old saying: "There are no small crimes, only small criminals".

name: Dungeon Master
description: This seemingly jolly giant is not to be trifled with! He expects a completely silent dungeon except for the bellowing sounds of his own raucous laughter and does not take kindly to being disturbed. Anyone brave (or foolish) enough to awaken and annoy this boisterous behemoth might just find themselves confined to his infinite dungeon forever!

name: Gate Keeper Mouse
description: This mouse has a rather unique occupation which is essentially to be professionally stubborn. He was entrusted to keep the gates of the infinite dungeon secure and he has found that the best and most efficient way to do that is simply to not let anyone in or out... ever. His policy might not make him very popular but it sure is effective!

name: Jovial Jailor Mouse
description: Few mice (or humans for that matter) are as well-suited and content with their lot in life as the Jovial Jailor. This mouse wakes up every morning with a smile on his face as he marches off to his dream job of patrolling an infinite dungeon.

name: Key Master Mouse
description: This diligent dungeon dweller prides herself on her meticulous and downright exhaustive organizational habits. As the Key Master, it is her sole responsibility to keep track of every single key to every single cell in what seems to be an infinite dungeon! No one knows how she does it because everyone is afraid to break her concentration by asking.

name: Leafton Beanwell
description: What this tiny creature lacks in size, it makes up for in courage, honour, and pride. Leafton is the leader of the noble clan Beanwell who have called the Bountiful Beanstalk their home for ages untold. They boldly claim to be the first clan to live amongst the leaves and it is this claim that started the great feud between the Beanwells and the Thornborns that still persists to this day.

name: Lethargic Guard Mouse
description: Guarding all of the inmates of the dungeon is a difficult and tiring task and as this slothful sentry is well aware, the easiest way to deal with a difficult task is... not to do it! The Lethargic Guard is pretty sure that his presence in the dungeon should be enough to keep the prisoners in line and that the "active" part of active duty is largely superfluous.

name: Malevolent Maestro
description: This colossal composer expects nothing short of a perfect performance from her orchestra and nothing short of absolute silence from her audience. Any creature, mouse or hunter alike, who dares to make enough noise in the Ballroom to disturb her sinister symphony had best be prepared to suffer the wrath of this vengeful virtuoso!

name: Malicious Marquis Mouse
description: Of all the nefarious nobles who have darkened the Great Hall with their presence, few are as fiendish, ferocious, and frightening as the infamous Malicious Marquis. This merciless mouse is so despicable that even the other Ruthless Royals keep their distance from him. No one has ever tried to learn his true intentions mainly because no one believes that they would be able to stomach knowing the details.

name: Mythical Giant King
description:
After being foiled by the hunters of Gnawnia at the Table of Contents, the Mythweaver was forced to abandon his plan to rewrite the Book of Lore. But as the hunters celebrated prematurely, this brilliant baddie vowed never to rest until his conquest was realized and thus he began work on an even more dastardly plan. Rather than simply rewriting history, the Mythweaver would use his formidable magic to write himself directly into Gnawnia's most important tales and conquer them each from within!

And so he began with the beloved Tale of the Bountiful Beanstalk in which a young hero defeats a greedy giant and restores the honour and riches that were stolen from his family. But where the original giant failed, the Mythweaver would succeed by making himself into the mighty and malevolent Mythical Giant King!

Now the Castle in the Clouds that hovers above the Bountiful Beanstalk is ruled by the biggest, smartest, and most sinister Giant that it has ever known. From this elevated seat of power, the Mythweaver will crush the young hero who dares to climb his beanstalk and the collective consciousness of Gnawnia will never be the same again!

Perhaps the fearless MouseHunters of Gnawnia can somehow find a way to insert themselves into this story and, with cunning, bravery, and a lot of luck, ensure that the hero fulfills their destiny by endowing this tyrannical Giant with a steep fall from grace!

name: Obstinate Oboist Mouse
description: It is not uncommon for an extremely passionate and tirelessly devoted artist to be viewed as stubborn. However, there are those who take that distinction to a whole new level. This very talented but completely unreasonable Oboist is one such musician who, much to the chagrin of the rest of the orchestra, has dedicated their life in pursuit of a single, very strange, and rather irritating goal: to master the "infinite note"! No one really knows how long the Obstinate Oboist has been siting there playing this one note but it feels like an eternity and no amount of desperate pleading seems capable of deterring them from this utterly asinine endeavour.

name: Peaceful Prisoner Mouse
description: This tranquil, harmonious creature somehow managed to find enlightenment in the depths of the dark and dreary dungeon. All of his worldly concerns and inhibitions, like his transgressions, are now a thing of the past.

name: Peevish Piccoloist Mouse
description: This imposing, ill-tempered fellow plays a small instrument with a big attitude. He is not exactly the friendliest member of the orchestra so it's best to keep your distance and whatever you do, don't call it a "baby flute"!

name: Pernicious Prince Mouse
description: The most dangerous member of court is the one with the most to lose and thus no one with any good sense would dare tangle with the heir to the throne. The famed Pernicious Prince is known equally for his calculated cunning as well as his formidable prowess in battle. Don't let his bedroom eyes deceive you, his blood is the coldest shade of blue and the only thing on his mind is securing his place on the throne at any cost.

name: Plotting Page Mouse
description: This clever young mouse has no intention of being an assistant forever! He has big dreams for his ultimate position in the Great Hall and has an assortment of malevolent machinations in the works to help him realize these deceitful desires.

name: Sassy Salsa Dancer Mouse
description: This flashy, talented, but impudent dancer has a consistent and contemptuous habit of completely taking over the dance floor. Despite his elegant and impressive moves, he is forced to dance solo since all the other dancers can't stand his abrasive personality and blindingly bright attire.

name: Scheming Squire Mouse
description: This suspicious subordinate has a bizarre tendency to go through knights rather quickly. Most squires only serve a single knight before eventually becoming one themselves but this cunning mouse has had mysterious and inexplicable accidents befall every knight that she has served. It's most likely just an ongoing series of unfortunate coincidences however, one can't help but wonder whether she may be up to something...

name: Smug Smuggler Mouse
description: This arrogant inmate has got a lot more than just tricks up her sleeve!

name: Sultry Saxophonist Mouse
description: This saxophone superstar is well known throughout the Ballroom of the Castle in the Clouds as an artist with a tireless dedication to his craft. He won't let anything stop him from bestowing the generous gift of his smooth, sultry sounds to his many adoring fans. Some have tried to silence his genius but none have ever succeeded because this provocative prodigy is above the law. His origin is a mystery but his magnetism is palpable, and when he speaks, he does so with a careless whisper.

name: Treacherous Tubaist Mouse
description: This hotheaded, brash brass player packs a lot of punch with every low-pitched note that he belts out. He affectionately and accurately describes his tuba as an instrument of mass destruction and regularly uses it to execute his boisterous and brutal bass instincts.

name: Vindictive Viscount Mouse
description: The revered role of a Viscount has primarily been judicial and they have traditionally been relied upon as impartial arbiters of the King's justice. This particular Viscount however, doesn't quite fit that description as well as his predecessors. He is vain, greedy, ambitious, and is infamous for never letting go of a grudge!

name: Vinneus Stalkhome
description: This imposing creature carries a lot of weight on the Bountiful Beanstalk (literally and figuratively) and has earned the nickname: "Protector of the Stalk". When the rivalries between the Thornborns and the Beanwells go too far, Vinneus Stalkhome emerges from her vines to settle the dispute and puts both clans in their place. She is equally feared and beloved for she is the one who brings balance to the beanstalk and guards its precious zones from unwanted climbers.

name: Violent Violinist Mouse
description: The best musicians are often driven by intense passion and some of them are even driven all the way to madness. This maniacally musical mouse however has been driven well past madness and straight to unbridled fury. It might be best to just steer clear of this animalistic artist or else you might suffer the same fate as those poor, helpless violin strings!

name: Whimsical Waltzer Mouse
description: This carefree music lover lives to dance and only truly feels at home while gliding gracefully around the Ballroom of the Castle in the Clouds. While many of the other socialites are preoccupied by hobnobbing, this free spirit is perfectly content to ignore the world around her and express herself exclusively through movement.

name: Wrathful Warden Mouse
description: This mean, merciless, moustachioed brute runs a tight, no-nonsense dungeon with strict rules and even stricter punishments. The only thing capable of distracting this attentive authoritarian from his duties is the luxurious scent of Royal Beanster cheese.

name: Herbaceous Bravestalk
description:
No one knows the origin of this mysterious and elusive warrior but its presence on the Bountiful Beanstalk seems to have ushered in a new era of health, wealth, and creativity. It sides with neither clan but is a friend to both and though they agree on very little, they are aligned in the belief that the beanstalk is a better place thanks to this noble champion.

Only SUPER|brie+ can lure out this evasive mouse but any hunter who can catch it will be rewarded with the Condensed Creativity from its mighty staff.

name: M1000
description:
This unthinkable abomination is the result of the Mythweaver's exhaustive research into all the most dangerous and most infamous mice across the Kingdom.

It was built as the ultimate guardian of the Folklore Forest, programmed exclusively to prevent the pesky MouseHunters from delving deeper into the Mythweaver's nefarious plans in that fantastical place. This is his proudest creation as it embodies everything that makes the mice of Gnawnia fearsome, formidable, and destined for greatness. He considers it the perfect mouse and a shining example of why the Kingdom truly belongs to the mice and thus why the humans deserve to be written out of its history completely.

This astonishing creation is powered by the highly advanced and mind-bogglingly powerful Kilohertz Processors. These tiny devices imbue the M1000 with unimaginable might and it is believed that any hunter who managed to retrieve and activate them would be able to harness the power and luck contained within for themselves.

name: Arcana Overachiever Mouse
description: This confident caster studies excessively hard and revels in any opportunity to show off their awesome aptitude for the Arcane Arts!

name: Arcane Master Sorcerer
description: This enchanted educator is flamboyant, unpredictable, and energetic... in a very literal way! She has been teaching the creative craft of Arcane Arts for far longer than even she can remember. What her lessons lack in structure and preparation, they make up for in pomp and spectacle. She is most famous around campus for her polytechnic pyrotechnic light shows which are enlightening, entertaining, and a bit dangerous for the students in the front row.

name: Audacious Alchemist Mouse
description: This reckless student of the Shadow Sciences likes to play fast and loose with the dangerous field of improvisational alchemy. No one knows what strange and volatile mixtures are being concocted in those cauldrons but safety equipment is highly recommended!

name: Bookworm Mouse
description: This mouse spends the majority of its time tucked away in the school's library gorging on books. There aren't enough printed words in the whole kingdom to satisfy this mouse's love for reading!

name: Broomstick Bungler Mouse
description: This clumsy student of the Arcane Arts may have high aspirations but it has a lot more to worry about than just a falling grade point average.

name: Celestial Summoner Mouse
description: This promising pupil proved himself to be a cut above his classmates when he demonstrated his astounding ability to not only summon the stars themselves but to then store them in a glass beaker and carry them with him wherever he goes! Due to this impressive skill, his fellow students have nominated him to be in charge of the light show for the post-exam dance party.

name: Cheat Sheet Conjurer Mouse
description: This savvy scholar avoids studying by conjuring a useful cheat sheet from past students who have taken the final exam many years earlier. This same cheat sheet has been passed from one cunning student to another for countless generations so it's fortunate for them that the teachers have been too lazy to rewrite the test questions.

name: Class Clown Mouse
description: This loud-mouthed, rambunctious, animated trickster may still be an apprentice at sorcery but he's a master at distraction, disturbance, and tomfoolery. His fellow students love his hilarious antics but his teachers are not so easily amused.

name: Classroom Disrupter Mouse
description: This devious, mischievous mouse is the bane of every hard-working teacher that has had the misfortune of trying to teach him. There seems to be no end to his antics and as a result, he tends to spend most of his time in the time-out corner. Unbeknownst to his teachers however, the dunce cap is the true source of his power!

name: Classroom Keener Mouse
description: At the front of every classroom is one student with a hand perpetually raised. They study excessively hard and can't resist any opportunity to demonstrate how much they've learned.

name: Constructively Critical Artist Mouse
description: This extremely talented Arcane Artist combines powerful conjuration magic with traditional oil on canvas and the result has widely been considered a critical hit!

name: Data Devourer Mouse
description: This immensely powerful shadow scholar has an unquenchable thirst for knowledge and will stop at nothing to collect and consume every piece of data ever recorded at the School of Sorcery.

name: Enchanted Chess Club Champion Mouse
description: This highly competitive mouse started an extra-curricular club for chess enthusiasts at the School of Sorcery. However, all the other students are afraid to join because when this mouse loses, his opponents have a tendency to disappear.

name: Featherlight Mouse
description: This powerful sorcerer-in-training is mastering the art of manipulating gravity! One wave of its owl wand can make it light as a feather while another wave will bring it crashing down with tremendous force. Beware that this Arcane Artist might float like a butterfly but it stings like a bee!

name: Hall Monitor Mouse
description:
The School of Sorcery has a long and exhaustive list of rules that are constantly being amended and extended. These rules are particularly strict with regards to loitering and lollygagging in the halls between classes. Since the detention dungeon is the last place that any student would want to find themselves, there is only one mouse that you will ever find roaming the halls at this school and that's the Hall Monitor.

Armed with the latest edition of the rules compendium and their signature silver mouse whistle, this strict scholarly sentinel stalks tirelessly up and down the halls with their trusty sidekick, Deborah the Safety Dragon, in search of any student bold or foolish enough to be cutting class.

Any hunter who finds themselves wandering the halls of the School of Sorcery is advised to enroll in a class as soon as possible or else they will suffer the shrill sound of the silver whistle, Deborah's foamy, disapproving growl, and worst of all, the Hall Monitor's most powerful and infamous spell: the Recitation of Infinite Rules!

name: Illustrious Illusionist Mouse
description: This tremendously talented senior sorcerer adds a uniquely bombastic flourish to every spell that he casts. He is an Arcane Artist in the truest sense of the words as every inch of him is an artistic expression, dripping with style and fantastical flamboyance.

name: Invisible Fashionista Mouse
description: This Arcane Artist is majoring in Sorcerer's Fashion and is so dedicated to her craft that she cast a permanent invisibility spell on herself so as not to distract anyone from her outstanding outfits!

name: Magical Multitasker Mouse
description: One course at a time wasn't enough for this studious scientist! She pushes herself to the limit by doing all of her homework for all of her courses simultaneously. Keeping all of those things in her head at the same time requires a lot of concentration so she doesn't take kindly to being interrupted.

name: Misfortune Teller Mouse
description: This mouse has been studying the art of foretelling the future but unfortunately, things are not looking good!

name: Mixing Mishap Mouse
description: This curious, would-be alchemist still has a lot to learn about safety precautions in the classroom so she tends to have a pretty tough time finding a lab partner.

name: Mythical Master Sorcerer
description:
After his unceremonious fall from grace from the Castle in the Clouds above the Bountiful Beanstalk, the Mythweaver once again eluded capture by writing a version of himself into another classic Gnawnian folktale: The Tale of the Sorcerer's Apprentice.

This time his plan was to take over where the previous Master Sorcerer had failed by training an army of his own magical minions in the ways of sorcery so that he could successfully defeat the willful apprentice. He wrote himself in as the headmaster of the School of Sorcery and set to work at instilling his insidious instructions.

It is now up to the brave MouseHunters of Gnawnia to take over the role of the young apprentice and learn to become a powerful master sorcerer so that they can put a stop to the malevolent Mythweaver and the school's latest corrupt cohort of cursed conjurers!

name: Perpetual Detention Mouse
description: This mouse can't help itself from getting into trouble and therefore often spends most of its time in detention. Unfortunately, at the School of Sorcery, detention duties tend to be a bit more hazardous than just writing phrases on a chalkboard.

name: Prestigious Prestidigitator Mouse
description: This whimsical wizard-in-training has focussed her studies on the science of swirling sparks and troublesome trickery. She has even learned the remarkable ability to make her bad grades disappear!

name: Shadow Master Sorcerer
description: This profound professor's extraordinarily powerful Shadow magic is fuelled by quantum fluctuations so minute that he had to invent his own tools to measure them. Upon realizing the potential of these bizarre, magical principles of physics, he discovered that as long as he doesn't measure himself, he can exist in a quantum superposition and therefore be in multiple places at once! This incredible revelation has tripled his productivity so now he can be teaching classes, grading papers, and snoozing in the staff lounge all at the same time!

name: Sleep Starved Scholar Mouse
description: This exhausted enchantress has been cramming for the Final Exam for so long that sleep is but a distant memory for her now. She has read every Arcane Arts textbook ever published three times over and in the process, has consumed more coffee than the entire faculty combined. Her eyes are bleary and her head is fuzzy but she is determined to go into that exam fully prepared... as long as she doesn't pass out and sleep through it!

name: Teleporting Truant Mouse
description: This sneaky scientist has mastered the ability to instantly teleport away whenever he hears the words "pop quiz". He'll often turn up in very unexpected places, such as random lockers, much to the chagrin of his fellow classmates.

name: Tyrannical Thaumaturge Mouse
description: This terrifyingly powerful student is an apprentice in name only as she has proven to rise above the rest of her classmates... literally. She uses a mysterious, mystical orb as an arcane focus to elevate her powers to an unsettling level. No one knows where she got the orb and although such things are technically not allowed during exams, the proctors are too afraid to attempt to confiscate it.

name: Uncoordinated Cauldron Carrier Mouse
description: There seems to be one in every study group. They try hard and they mean well but when the time comes to submit the group's final project, they tend to drop the ball... er, cauldron.

name: Crematio Scorchworth
description: This worn and weathered veteran has been wandering the Flame Caverns for longer than any Fire Dragon can remember. Despite his frail physique, he is still one of the most revered Fire Dragons and is generally considered to be a true trailblazer.

name: Malignus Vilestrom
description: The putrid stench that permeates the Toxic Tunnels can mostly be attributed to the work of this particular Poison Dragon. He makes it his life's work to pop all the poisonous pustules that grow throughout the tunnels so that their foul spores can spread freely along the underground air currents. This pungent odour acts as both an air freshener for those who dwell in the Toxic Tunnels and a repellent for those who attempt to invade them.

name: Rimeus Polarblast
description: This brisk beast has mastered the magic of harnessing and directing the fiercely frigid air currents that circulate through the Ice Lairs. Anyone who gets on this mouse's bad side is in for much more than just a cold shoulder.

name: Absolutia Harmonius
description: This mystical malfeasant believes staunchly in balance above all things and, in her opinion, balance can only be achieved and regulated by those who wield immeasurable power over all the elements. She has made it her mission to patrol the Elemental Dragons' Den and eliminate anything or anyone that would upset her ideal of perfect balance... such as an unwanted MouseHunter and their invasive droids.

name: Arcticus the Biting Frost
description: This frighteningly frigid fiend inhabits the deepest, coldest regions of the Ice Lairs where the average temperature is dangerously close to absolute zero. From this icy throne, Arcticus commands a chilling army of Ice Dragons whose sole purpose is to make the entire world as cold and unforgiving as their master's heart. This terrifying dragon's icy breath is so powerful that some believe it may be the true origin of Gnawnia's icebergs.

name: Avalancheus the Glacial
